T09TD4154E:225a-1: n'a g'a na n'a n'a ma n'a ta ka / bod skad du /
T09TD4154E:225a-2: klu kun du dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zlos gar /
T09TD4154E:225a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T09TD4154E:225a-4: dga' ma dga' ba'i zol las skyes pa'i spu langs dag gis bsgribs pa'i lus 'dzin cing //
T09TD4154E:225a-5: 'dzum dang ldan pas rgyal ba'i byang chub dag la bkod pa me tog snyim pa ni //
T09TD4154E:225a-6: gshog rtsal rab bskyod sgra sgrogs sbrang rtsi byed rnams sbrang rtsi re bas bsten cing de'i //
T09TD4154E:225a-7: rkang pas bsnun pas kha zum tshogs phye ge sar gsar par gyur pa khyed la srungs //
T09TD4154E:225a-8: bsam gtan zol dag nye bar bzung nas skad cig mig phye su la sems par byed //
T09TD4154E:225a-9: skyob pa yin yang lus med 'das gzir skye bo 'di dag srung ba min la ltos //
T09TD4154E:225a-10: snying rjer ldan par brdzus te khyod las gzhan pa'i brtse med skyes bu ga la yod //
T09TD4154E:225a-11: bdud mo rnams kyis byang chub la 'di phrag dog gis brjod rgyal bas khyed la srungs //
T09TD4154E:225a-12: gzhan yang gzhu bkang 'dod pa dang ni rnga gsang brdung zhing sgra sgrogs bdud kyi dpa' bo dang //
T09TD4154E:225a-13: smin 'khyog rab 'dar glal 'dzum logs su lta ba mtho ris bu mo'i skye bo dang //
T09TD4154E:225a-14: grub pa yan lag mchog btud rnams dang mtshar bas spu langs lus can nor lha yis //
T09TD4154E:225a-15: byang chub 'thob la bsam gtan g-yo med ces bltas thub pa'i dbang pos khyed la srungs //
T09TD4154E:225a-16: shin tu mang bar 'gyur bas dga' bar byas te mdo 'dzin pa'o //
T09TD4154E:225a-17: di ring bdag po'i dga' ston la phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs ba dpal ldan dga' ba'i lha'i zhabs kyi padma nye bar bsten pa'i rgyal po'i tshogs rnams kyis gus pa dang ldan par bos te /
T09TD4154E:225a-19: ji ltar kho bo cag gi rje dpal ldan dga' ba'i lhas /
T09TD4154E:225a-20: sngar med pa'i dngos po'i rgyan rnam par bkod pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i sges rabs las brtsams pa //
T09TD4154E:225a-21: klu kun du dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zlos gar mdzad pa ni kho bo cag rnams kyi nyan pa po'i brgyud pa las thos te /
T09TD4154E:225a-22: sbyor ba dag ni ma mthong ngo //
T09TD4154E:225a-23: de'i phyir rgyal po de nyid la gus pa dang /
T09TD4154E:225b-0: kho bo @225b cag la rjes su gzung ba'i blos sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du khyod kyis zlos gar dag byos shig ces so //
T09TD4154E:225b-1: de'i phyir re zhig tshon gyi bkod pa dag byas nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:225b-2: 'dus pa'i skye bo 'di dag gi yid ni kun du tshim par gyur to zhes bya bar bdag gis nges te /
T09TD4154E:225b-4: dpal ldan dga' ba snyan dngags mkhan po mkhas la 'dus pa 'di dag yon tan 'dzin //
T09TD4154E:225b-5: 'jig rten du ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid 'phrog zlos gar bdag cag mkhas //
T09TD4154E:225b-6: 'dir ni dngos po re re dag kyang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'i gnas yin na //
T09TD4154E:225b-7: bdag gi skal pa rgyas pas yon tan kun gyi tshogs 'dus 'di la smos ci dgos //
T09TD4154E:225b-8: des na re zhig khyim pa mo bos te glu dag la gnas par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:225b-9: yongs su bgrod cing phyir mngon par phyogs te bltas nas 'phags ma re zhig 'dir //
T09TD4154E:225b-10: de nas gar mkhan ma ngu zhing zhugs so //
T09TD4154E:225b-12: 'phags ma klu kun du dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zlos gar bya ba yin na ci'i don du rgyu med pa nyid du ngu bar byed /
T09TD4154E:225b-13: gar mkhan mas jo bo ji ltar mi ngu ste /
T09TD4154E:225b-14: gang gi phyir re zhig yab ni yum dang 'grogs nas rgan po'i dngos pos yid byung ste /
T09TD4154E:225b-15: da ni khyod kyis gnyen tshan gyi khur dag 'dzin par bzod do zhes thugs la bzhag nas dka' thub kyi nags su gshegs so //
T09TD4154E:225b-16: mdo 'dzin pas bdag kyang yongs su btang nas ji ltar yab yum nags su gshegs /
T09TD4154E:225b-17: rnam par bsams nas de la da ni ci zhig rigs par 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:225b-18: yang na bdag bla ma'i zhabs kyi rim gro byed pa'i bde ba yongs su btang nas ji ltar khyim du 'dug par byed /
T09TD4154E:225b-19: ji ltar sprin gyi bzhon pa bzhin //
T09TD4154E:225b-20: dbang phyug rim pas 'ongs btang ste //
T09TD4154E:225b-21: pha ma'i sri zhu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T09TD4154E:225b-22: bdag kyang nags su 'gro bar bya //
T09TD4154E:225b-23: song bar gyur te skabs dbye ba'o //
T09TD4154E:225b-24: de nas sprin gyi bzhon pa dang /
T09TD4154E:225b-25: bi d'u sha ka dag zhugs te /
T09TD4154E:225b-27: chags pa'i gnas zhes bya bar bdag gis rig /'jig ces bya bar bdag gis ma rtogs min //
T09TD4154E:225b-28: bya dang bya min rnam par dpyad rnams la //
T09TD4154E:225b-29: phyir phyogs gyur bar sal sus ma rig / pha ma'i sri zhu byed pa bdag gi ni //
T09TD4154E:225b-30: lang tsho dbang po'i dbang du gyur pa 'di //
T09TD4154E:225b-31: gal te gus pas 'di ltar nyid gyur na //
T09TD4154E:225b-32: de ltar smad par 'os kyang dga' byed 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:226a-1: kas khros pa dang bcas par /
T09TD4154E:226a-2: kye gang gi tshe gson bzhin du shi ba'i rgan rgon 'di dag 'di ltar nags na 'dug pa la 'di snyed kyi dus su sdug bsngal nyams su myong yang khyod ni yid byung bar ma gyur to //
T09TD4154E:226a-3: des na rab tu dang bas da dung yang re zhig bla ma'i zhabs kyi sri zhu la chags pa las phyir bzlog la rgyal srid kyi bde ba nyams su myong bar byos shig /'dren pas /
T09TD4154E:226a-4: ji ltar yab kyi mdun du sar 'dug mdzes pa de lta seng ge'i khri la yod dam ci //
T09TD4154E:226a-5: yab kyi zhabs dag nyed pa las byung bde ba de ni rgyal srid dag la'ang yod dam ci //
T09TD4154E:226a-6: bla ma'i lhag ma spyad pa'i dga' ba gang 'dis sa gsum spyad pa dag la yod dam ci //
T09TD4154E:226a-7: bla mas btang ba'i rgyal srid nges par gdung byed dag ste des na yon tan ci zhig yod //
T09TD4154E:226a-9: bdag nyid kyis rtogs par ae ma 'di ni skye bo bla ma'i sri zhu la chags ba zhig go snyam du bsams nas /
T09TD4154E:226a-10: des na 'dir yang re zhig brjod par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:226a-11: gsal bar kye grogs po nges par rgyal srid kyi bde ba 'ba' zhig gi ched du bdag gis 'di brjod pa ma yin te /
T09TD4154E:226a-12: gzhan yang khyod la bya ba dag yod pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:226a-14: 'dzum dang bcas pas bya ba bdag gis byas pa nyid ma yin nam ltos shig / rigs par 'os pa'i lam la blon po rnams sbyar dam pa rnams ni bde la bzhag / de bzhin gnyen gyi skye bo bdag mtshungs nyid byas rgyal srid dag kyang bsrung bar byas //
T09TD4154E:226a-15: yid la re ba las lhag 'bras ster bdag bsam shing yang slong ba rnams la byin //
T09TD4154E:226a-16: 'di las gzhan pa'i bya ba ci zhig khyod kyi sems la gang zhig gnas pa smros /
T09TD4154E:226a-18: kye grogs po shin tu thub chod ldan zhing nyams par byed pa'i lha /
T09TD4154E:226a-19: ma tang ga 'di mi mthun pa'i phyogs su nye bar gnas bal gtso bo dang gnyen dag yang dag par gnas kyang khyod med na bdag ni rgyal srid legs par gnas par mi rtog go //
T09TD4154E:226a-20: 'dren pas ma tang gas rgyal srid len par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i dogs pa yod dam ci /
T09TD4154E:226a-21: gal te de ltar gyur na de las cir 'gyur /
T09TD4154E:226a-22: bdag gi lus la sogs pa thams cad gzhan gyi don nyid du yongs su bsrungs pa ma yin nam /
T09TD4154E:226a-23: gang yang rang gis ma byin pa de ni yab kyi ngor yin no //
T09TD4154E:226a-24: des na don med pa'i bsam ba 'dis ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:226b-0: yab kyis rjes @226b su bstan pa nyid lhur bsgrub par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:226b-2: kye yab kyis ci zhig bstan /
T09TD4154E:226b-4: ji ltar nyi ma mang por yongs su dpyad pas dka' thub kyi nags 'di yam shing dang /
T09TD4154E:226b-7: nye bar mkho ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T09TD4154E:226b-11: rngad mang ba dag ring du byas par gyur gyis //
T09TD4154E:226b-13: ma la ya'i ri la song la bsti gnas 'ga' zhig rtogs shig ces yab kyis bdag la rjes su bstan to //
T09TD4154E:226b-14: de'i phyir re zhig ma la ya nyid du 'gro'o zhes te song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:226b-15: bi d'u sha kas mdun du bltas nas kye grogs po ltos shig ltos shig / rlan dang bcas shing stug po'i tsan dan gyi nags kyi khrod nas yongs su bskyod pa dri bzang rgya chen pos bsgos ba can ri'i ngos mi bzad pa las babs pas dum bur 'gyur ba'i chu rgyun las 'thor ba'i thigs pa bsil po 'dzin pa ma la ya'i rlung 'di ni nges par lam gyis yongs su dub pa dag sel zhing /
T09TD4154E:226b-16: dang por 'grogs par 'dod pa'i dga' ma la mgrin pa nas bzung ba bzhin du grogs po mdza' bo la spu long rgyas par byed pa 'dra'o //
T09TD4154E:226b-17: 'dren pas kun du bltas nas aa ye bdag cag gis rim la yar sleb par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:226b-19: ae ma 'di ni dga' bar bya ba zhig ste /
T09TD4154E:226b-21: dga' ldan phyogs kyi glang po 'gram ba'i ngos 'dar tsan dan dag ni cha ga cing zag / chu gter rlabs rnams rab tu bsnun pas phug dang lung pa dag ni cho nges sgrogs //
T09TD4154E:226b-22: grub pa'i bud med bgrod pa rnams kyi rkang pa'i smug rtsis dmar pa mu tig rdo //
T09TD4154E:226b-23: bsten bya ri bo ma la ya 'dis bdag gi sems ni ci yang sred ldan byed //
T09TD4154E:226b-24: des na tshur sheg /'di la 'dzegs te 'dug par 'os ba'i bsti gnas dag btsal bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:226b-25: 'jogs te mtshan ma gsal bar byas nas /
T09TD4154E:226b-26: bdag gi mig ni g-yas pa g-yo //
T09TD4154E:226b-28: thub pa'i gsung yang brdzun ma yin //
T09TD4154E:226b-29: 'di ni ci zhig 'chad 'gyur ke / bi d'u sha kas /
T09TD4154E:226b-30: kye grogs po grogs po la dga' ba 'ga' zhig nye bar ston to //
T09TD4154E:226b-32: nges par ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:227a-0: kye grogs po ltos shig ltos shig / khyad par dang bcas par stug cing snum pa'i rkang 'thung gis nye bar mdzes shing ba'i mar gyi dri'i snying @227a * //
T09TD4154E:227a-1: pho can gyi du ba drag tu 'phyur la //
T09TD4154E:227a-2: ri dags kyi tshogs 'jigs pa med cing lam du bag phab ste gnas pa 'di ni dka' thub kyi nags tshal bzhin du mtshon no //
T09TD4154E:227a-4: grogs po yang dag par mtshon no //
T09TD4154E:227a-5: 'di dag ni dka' thub kyi nags tshal nyid de /
T09TD4154E:227a-7: gos kyi don du shing shun rnams bcad rtse ba nyid kyis shin tu che ba min //
T09TD4154E:227a-8: ril ba rnying ba chag pas mtshan pa'i chu rgyun dag ni mkha' ltar rab tu dang //
T09TD4154E:227a-9: 'ba' zhig dag na munydza'i ske rags khye'us bcad cing dor bar gyur pa mthong //
T09TD4154E:227a-10: rtag tu thos pas ne tsho dag kyang rig byed tshig 'di rab tu sgrogs par byed //
T09TD4154E:227a-11: des na tshur sheg rab tu zhugs te /
T09TD4154E:227a-13: rab tu zhugs te gar dag byed do //
T09TD4154E:227a-15: ae ma thub pa'i skye bo rab tu dga' ba rnams ni rig byed kyi tshig rgyas pa la the tshom rnam par gcod par byed la /
T09TD4154E:227a-16: khye'u'i skye bo rnams ni ji ltar gsher ba gsher ba'i yam shing dag gcod cing //
T09TD4154E:227a-17: dka' thub pa'i gzhon nu ma rnams ni ljon pa gsar ba'i kyo ra 'gengs par byed pa'i dka' thub kyi nags tshal ni rab tu zhi ba dang dga' bar byed pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:227a-19: bung ba'i sgra yis legs par 'ongs sam zhes ni brjod pa bzhin //
T09TD4154E:227a-20: 'di dag mgo ni 'bras bu dud pas 'dud par byed pa bzhin //
T09TD4154E:227a-21: me tog char pa 'thor zhing bdag la mchod yon ster ba bzhin //
T09TD4154E:227a-22: yal ga ldan pa yis kyang mgron gyi bsnyen bkur ji ltar bslabs //
T09TD4154E:227a-23: de'i phyir dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'dir ni 'dug par 'os pa zhig ste /
T09TD4154E:227a-24: 'dir gnas na bdag cag gi sems bde bar 'gyur ro snyam mo //
T09TD4154E:227a-26: kye grogs po 'on kyang nges par ri dags 'di dag mgrin pa cung zad kyogs te g-yo ba med pa'i kha las cung zad zos pa'i rtsva kham nang na gnas ba zag cing rna ba gcig rab tu bslangs te gtad nas mig zum pa dang bcas pas nyan par byed pa lta bur mtshon no //
T09TD4154E:227a-28: gnas thob rab tu gsal ba'i 'gros can gdangs snyan dag [*ngag?] gis rnam par gzhag pa 'dzin byed pa //
T09TD4154E:227a-29: bung ba'i sgra bzhin nges par yid 'phrog rgyud mangs dag gi rgyud mangs sgra dang ldan pa yis //
T09TD4154E:227a-30: gsal zhing rol sgeg tshig ldan glu ni kun du 'khyog pa'i lus can ri dags 'di dag rnams //
T09TD4154E:227b-0: so yi bar na gnas pa rtsva yi kham ni gcod pa'i sgra dag @227b bsdams nas nyan par byed //
T09TD4154E:227b-2: kye grogs po dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di na su zhig glu len par byed /
T09TD4154E:227b-4: ji ltar sor mo 'jam pa'i 'dab mas mngon par bsnun pa'i rgyud mangs shin tu gsal ba ma yin par sgrogs shing glu yang snyan cing phra ba gtsor len pa de ltar bdag rtog pa ni gnas 'di na lha dag mnyes par byed cing lha'i bud med rgyud mangs dang ldan pa'i glu len par byed do //
T09TD4154E:227b-6: kye grogs po tshur shog / yu'u cag kyang lha'i gnas blta bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:227b-8: nges par lha ni phyag bya bar 'os pa'o //
T09TD4154E:227b-9: nye bar song ste 'bral la 'dug nas grogs po gal te na skye bo 'di lta bar mi 'os pa srid do //
T09TD4154E:227b-10: de nas re zhig ta ma la'i gel ba 'di'i nang du 'dug ste lha lta ba'i skabs btsal bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:227b-12: de nas ma la ya can ma dang /
T09TD4154E:227b-13: 'bangs mo zhugs te sa la 'dug nas rgyud mangs spreng bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:227b-15: goo r'i rab rgyas padma'i ge sar gyi //
T09TD4154E:227b-16: dngul ltar dkar ba'i 'od can bcom ldan ma //
T09TD4154E:227b-17: khyod kyi bka' drin dag gis bdag gi ni //
T09TD4154E:227b-18: mngon par 'dod pa rab tu grub par mdzod //
T09TD4154E:227b-22: 'di la gsal byed kyi dbyangs rnam pa bcu po 'dis gsal ba thob cing /
T09TD4154E:227b-25: dal ba'i stabs rnam pa gsum rab tu gsal bar yongs su bcad de /
T09TD4154E:227b-26: pa lang gi rnga ma la sogs pa rnam pa gsum gyi rim pas ngal bso bar byas pa de kho na'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rol mo'i cho ga yang dag pa gsum bstan to //
T09TD4154E:227b-28: rje'i sras mo nges par yun ring du glu dag blangs nas khyod kyi lag rtse dag yongs su mi ngal lam /
T09TD4154E:227b-30: grung mo bcom ldan ma'i mdun du rgyud mangs sgrogs par byed pa la bdag ga la ngal /
T09TD4154E:227b-31: 'bangs mos smod pa dang bcas par kye brtse med ma 'di'i mdun du rgyud mangs bsgrags pas ci zhig bya zhes bdag smra'o //
T09TD4154E:227b-32: gang zhig 'di snyed kyi dus su skye bo gzhon nu ma'i dka' thub bsnyen nas nges pa la gnas pas bstan kyang da dung khyod la dang bar mi ston no //
T09TD4154E:227b-33: bi d'u sha kas thos nas /
T09TD4154E:227b-34: kye grogs po 'di ni nges par gzhon nu ma ste ci'i phyir mi lta /
T09TD4154E:227b-36: gzhon nu ma lta ba ni skyon med pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:228a-1: gal te na bdag cag mthong nas 'jigs te /
T09TD4154E:228a-2: ngo tsha ba gzhon nu ma la rnyed sla bas 'dir yun ring du mi sdod pa mi srid do //
T09TD4154E:228a-3: des na re zhig 'khri shing gi dra ba 'dis bsgribs te blta bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:228a-6: ya mtshan dang bcas par kye grogs po ltos shig ltos shig / ngo mtshar ro ngo mtshar ro //
T09TD4154E:228a-7: rgyud mangs kyi sgras rna ba'i bde ba skyed par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
T09TD4154E:228a-8: rnam par shes pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs 'dis mig gi yang bde ba skyed par byed do //
T09TD4154E:228a-9: de'i phyir 'di ni su zhig yin ci lha mo'am /
T09TD4154E:228a-11: yang na rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo 'am /
T09TD4154E:228a-12: yang na grub pa'i rigs las 'khrungs pa zhig go //
T09TD4154E:228a-13: 'dren pas rnam par blta zhing chags pa dang bcas par grogs po 'di su zhig yin zhes bdag gis ma rtogs so //
T09TD4154E:228a-15: gal te mtho ris bu mo yin na 'phrog byed mig stong ldan des don byas 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:228a-16: gal te klu yi bu mo yin na'ang 'di'i gdong yod tshe sa 'og zla bas stong ma yin //
T09TD4154E:228a-17: gal te rig 'dzin ma yin gzhan rigs las rgyal bdag cag rigs ni 'bras dang bcas //
T09TD4154E:228a-18: gal te grub rigs las skyes de phyir grub pa 'jig rten gsum du grags par 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:228a-20: 'dren pa la bltas nas dga' ba dang bcas shing rang gis rtogs par ae ma'o //
T09TD4154E:228a-21: yun ring po zhig nas yid srub kyi spyod yul du lhung bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:228a-26: mdza' ba dang bcas par kye bram ze bdag smra'o //
T09TD4154E:228a-27: brtse med ma 'di'i mdun du rgyud mangs bsgrags pas ci zhig bya zhes te rgyud mangs 'phang so //
T09TD4154E:228a-28: 'dren mas bu mo bcom ldan ma goo r'i la ma smad cig / ke ding bcom ldan mas bka' drin mdzad pa bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:228a-30: rje'i sras mo re zhig ci 'dra ba dag smros shig /'dren mas /
T09TD4154E:228a-31: bu mo nges par deng rmi lam du bdag 'di bzhin nyid du rgyu mangs bsgreng ba la bcom ldan mas gsungs pa /
T09TD4154E:228a-32: bu mo khyod kyis rgyud mangs bsgreng ba mkhas pa khyad par du 'phags pa 'di dang /
T09TD4154E:228a-33: bdag la thun mong ma yin pa'i gus pa bu mo'i dngos po la rnyed dka' ba 'dis bdag shin tu tshim par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:228b-0: de'i phyir yun ring po ma yin pa na rig @228b pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bas lag pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes so //
T09TD4154E:228b-1: 'bangs mos dga' ba dang bcas par rje'i sras mo /
T09TD4154E:228b-2: gal te de ltar yin na rmi lam du zhes ci'i phyir brjod //
T09TD4154E:228b-3: lha mos snying la 'dod pa'i mchog byin pa nyid yin no //
T09TD4154E:228b-5: nges bar bdag cag lha mo lta ba'i skabs su bab po //
T09TD4154E:228b-6: de'i phyir tshur sheg nye bar 'gro bar bya'o zhes te nye bar btud do //
T09TD4154E:228b-8: mi 'dod bzhin du khyer nas jo mo grung mo bdag bden par smra ste /
T09TD4154E:228b-9: 'di ni mchog byin pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:228b-10: 'dren mas 'jigs pa dang bcas par 'dren pa la mtshon te /
T09TD4154E:228b-11: bu mo 'di su zhig ces so //
T09TD4154E:228b-13: gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa 'dis na /
T09TD4154E:228b-14: 'di nyid bcom ldan mas bka' drin mdzad pa yin snyam mo //
T09TD4154E:228b-15: 'dren mas chags ba dang bcas shing ngo tsha ba dang bcas par bltas so //
T09TD4154E:228b-17: g-yo zhing yangs pa'i mig ldan dbugs 'byin cing //
T09TD4154E:228b-18: 'dar zhing mkhregs stug nu ldan 'khrul byed ma //
T09TD4154E:228b-19: lus 'di dka' thub nyid kyis shin tu ni //
T09TD4154E:228b-20: ngal gyur slar yang ci slad gdung bar byed //
T09TD4154E:228b-22: bu mo shin tu 'jigs pas 'di la mngon du phyogs te 'dug par mi nus so zhes te /
T09TD4154E:228b-25: jo mo khyod kyi dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di na gang zhig 'gron po 'ongs pa la tshig tsam gyis kyang phebs par smra ba ma yin pa 'di 'dra ba'i kun du spyod pa yod dam ci /
T09TD4154E:228b-27: 'gron po la bsnyen bkur bya ba rigs pa yin no //
T09TD4154E:228b-28: de'i phyir ji ltar mthu chen po dang ldan pa 'di dag la gus par bya ba la rmong par gnas /
T09TD4154E:228b-29: yang na khyod bzhugs shig / kho mo nyid kyis ji ltar rigs pa dag bya'i /
T09TD4154E:228b-30: 'dren pa la mtshon te jo bo legs par 'ongs sam /
T09TD4154E:228b-31: jo bo stan yong su bzung bas phyogs 'di brgyan bar mdzod cig / bi d'u sha kas /
T09TD4154E:228b-32: kye grogs po 'di ni legs par smra'o //
T09TD4154E:228b-33: yud tsam zhig 'dug ste ngal gso bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:228b-37: 'dren mas kva yi bzhad gad kyi ngang tshul can ma de ltar ma byed /
T09TD4154E:228b-38: gal te dka' thub pa 'ga' zhig gis mthong na 'di las bdag dul ba ma yin pa dang ldan par dogs par 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:228b-39: de nas dka' thub pa zhugs te /
T09TD4154E:228b-40: rigs kyi bdag po koo shi kas bdag la bka' bsgos pa /
T09TD4154E:229a-3: rgyal tshab bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gzhon nu sprin gyi bzhon pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur bdag ri ma ya 'di nyid kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig na gnas pa sring mo ma la ya can gyi khyim thab kyi slad du blta ba'i phyir di ring 'ongs te /
T09TD4154E:229a-4: gal te de blta zhing ma la ya can gyi nyi ma gung gi mchod sbyin gyi dus yol bar 'gyur srid do //
T09TD4154E:229a-5: des na de bos la shog shig ces so //
T09TD4154E:229a-6: des na bdag re zhig goo r'i'i khang pa nyid du 'gro'o //
T09TD4154E:229a-7: 'gro zhing sa la rnam par bltas nas /
T09TD4154E:229a-8: aa ye rdul dang ldan pa'i phyogs na rab tu gsal ba'i 'khor los mtshan pa'i rjes kyi phreng bdag snang ba 'di su zhig gi yin /
T09TD4154E:229a-9: mdun du bltas te sprin gyi bzhon ba la nges par brtags nas 'di ni skyes bu chen po 'di yin nam snyam mo //
T09TD4154E:229a-11: mgo la gtsug tor 'di gsal smin ma'i bar na mdzod spu 'di ni rnam par mdzes //
T09TD4154E:229a-12: mig ni padma'i rjes su mthun zhing brang gdengs 'phrog byed dag la 'gran par byed //
T09TD4154E:229a-13: lag pa 'khor los mtshan pa ji ltar de ltar skyes bu dag ni su zhig 'di /
T09TD4154E:229a-14: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i gnas dag ma thob 'dug pa yin nam snyam /
T09TD4154E:229a-15: yang na the tshom gyis ci zhig bya ste /
T09TD4154E:229a-16: shin tu gsal bar 'di ni sprin gyi bzhon pa yin par nges so //
T09TD4154E:229a-17: mal ya can mal bltas nas aa ye 'di yang rgyal bo'i bu mo'o //
T09TD4154E:229a-19: gal te phan tshun rjes su 'tsham pa 'di dag 'brel par byed na byed pa po ni yun ring po zhig na rig pa byed par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:229a-20: nye bar btud nas khyod ni dge bar gyur cig /'dren pas /
T09TD4154E:229a-21: bcom ldan sprin gyi bzhon pa phyag bgyid do zhes te ldang bar 'dod do //
T09TD4154E:229a-22: dka' thub bas mngon du ldang mi dgos so //
T09TD4154E:229a-23: kye mngon 'ongs kun gyi bla ma nyid ces pas /
T09TD4154E:229a-24: khyod nyid bdag cag gi bla ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:229a-25: des na ji ltar bde bar bzhugs shig / ma la ya can mas /
T09TD4154E:229a-27: dka' thub pas de mthong nas /
T09TD4154E:229a-28: rjes su 'tsham pa'i bdag po'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig / rgyal po'i bu mo /
T09TD4154E:229a-29: khyod la rigs kyi bdag po koo shi kas bka' stsal pa /
T09TD4154E:229a-30: khyod kyi mchod sbyin gyi dus yol bar 'gyur gyis myur du shog shig ces so //
T09TD4154E:229a-32: mi dga' ba dang bcas par /
T09TD4154E:229a-33: gang bla mas bka' stsal pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:229b-1: gcig ni bla ma'i gsung dang gzhan //
T09TD4154E:229b-2: mdza' bo blta ba'i rtse dga' bzang //
T09TD4154E:229b-5: shugs phyung zhing langs te ngo tsha ba dang bcas shing chags pa dang bcas par 'dren pa la blta zhing dka' thub pa dang lhan cig song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:229b-7: sred pa dang bcas par shugs phyung nas 'dren ma la blta zhing /
T09TD4154E:229b-8: tshang ra'i khyon gyi khur ldan zhig //
T09TD4154E:229b-10: gzhan du 'gro yang bdag gi ni //
T09TD4154E:229b-11: snying la gom pa bkod par gyur //
T09TD4154E:229b-13: tshur sheg chur sheg / rje'i sras mo zhes te ;
T09TD4154E:229b-14: ma la ya can ma 'khor dang bcas pa song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:229b-16: kye gang zhig blta bar bya ba dag mthong ngo //
T09TD4154E:229b-17: da ni nyi ma gung gi nyi ma'i gdung ba nyis 'gyur du byas pa bzhin du bdag gi lto ba'i me dag lhab lhab byed do //
T09TD4154E:229b-19: gang gis bram ze dag gi mgron du 'gyur bar byas nas thub pa'i skye bo las dngos su rnyed pa'i rtsa ba dang chu ba la sogs pas srog gzung bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:229b-23: bcom ldan 'od zer stong phrag ldan ni nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dzegs te bzhugs so //
T09TD4154E:229b-25: gdung bas de dus tsan dan la bdar thang chus dkar ba'i 'gram pa 'dzin byed cing //
T09TD4154E:229b-26: rang gi rna ba bskyod pa'i rlung ni yang dag chags pas bzhin la g-yo ba byed cing //
T09TD4154E:229b-27: lag bas gtor ba'i chu thigs snying khar khyad par du 'dren glang po'i bdag po 'di //
T09TD4154E:229b-28: da ni bzod dka' zug rdu drag pos zug pa lta bu'i gnas skabs 'dzin par byed //
T09TD4154E:229b-29: ces te gnyi ga song ngo ;
T09TD4154E:229b-33: rje'i sras mo mal ya can mas /
T09TD4154E:229b-35: bu mo me tog gsar ba can bdag gi ming po jo bo bshes gnyen gyi dbyig di ring yun ring du thogs so //
T09TD4154E:229b-36: de'i phyir song la 'ong ngam mi 'ong rtogs shig ces so //
T09TD4154E:229b-37: yongs su bgrod de phyi rol du mngon par phyogs shing bltas nas /
T09TD4154E:229b-38: 'di nyid nas 'ongs pa 'di su zhig yin /
T09TD4154E:229b-39: nges par brtags nas ci grung mo'am /
T09TD4154E:229b-40: 'bangs mo gnyis pa yang zhugs so //
T09TD4154E:229b-41: dang po mas nye bar btud nas /
T09TD4154E:229b-42: grogs mo grung mo khyod kyang ci'i phyir mgyogs par 'gro bar byed /
T09TD4154E:230a-1: rje'i sras mo ma la ya can mas bdag la gsungs pa /
T09TD4154E:230a-2: bu mo grung mo bdag gi lus kyis me tog thu ba'i yongs su ngal ba mi bzod do //
T09TD4154E:230a-3: ston ka'i gdung bas byas pa bzhin du bdag yongs su gdung bas shing tu lhag par gzir bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:230a-4: des na khyod song la chu shing gzhon nu'i 'dab mas bsgribs pa tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang par /
T09TD4154E:230a-5: zla ba chu shel gi rdol mal stan chas gyis shig ces so //
T09TD4154E:230a-6: ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bdag gis kyang byas te /
T09TD4154E:230a-7: de'i phyir song nas rje'i sras mo nyid la sbran par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:230a-9: gal te de ltar yin na myur du chas dag gyis shig / der song na de'i gdung ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:230a-10: gnyis bas bgad nas rang gis rtogs par gang zhig 'di 'dra ba'i gdung ba dag ni de lta bus nye bar zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:230a-11: rnam par bkra zhing dga' bar bya ba tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang pa mthong nas de ni shin tu yang lhag par 'gyur ro zhes bdag rtog go //
T09TD4154E:230a-12: gsal bar grogs mo khyod song shig / bdag gis kyang rdo ba'i gzhi bstar ba bdag rje'i sras mol sbran par bya'o zhes nas song ste 'jug par byed pa'o //
T09TD4154E:230a-13: de nas sred pa dang ldan pa'i ma la ya can ma dang /
T09TD4154E:230a-15: 'dren mas shugs nar phyung nas bdag nyid kyis rtogs par //
T09TD4154E:230a-16: skye bo de la sems khyod kyis bdag ngo tshas /
T09TD4154E:230a-17: de ltar phyir phyogs par byas te /
T09TD4154E:230a-18: da ni khyod nyid der 'gro ba'i phyir na /
T09TD4154E:230a-19: ae ma khyod ni bdag nyid rgyas par byed pa zhig go //
T09TD4154E:230a-21: bu mo bcom ldan ma'i gnas su 'gro ba'i lam dag bdag la ston cig /'bangs mos rje'i sras mo tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang par gshegs pa ma lags sam /
T09TD4154E:230a-23: ngo tsha dang bcas pas bu mo khyod kyis legs par dran par byas so //
T09TD4154E:230a-24: de'i phyir tshur sheg de nyid du 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:230a-25: 'bangs mos byon cig byon cig rje'i sras mo song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:230a-26: 'dren ma gzhan du song ba na /
T09TD4154E:230a-27: 'bangs mos phyir bltas nas mya ngan dang bcas shing bdag nyid kyis rtogs par kye ma 'di ni snying gis stong ba zhig ste ji ltar yang lha mo'i gnas de nyid du 'jug par byed do //
T09TD4154E:230a-28: gsal bar de na tsan dan 'khri shing khang pa yod pa ma yin nam /
T09TD4154E:230a-29: des na 'dir byon cig /'dren mas skyengs pa'i 'dzum dang bcas par de ltar byed do //
T09TD4154E:230b-0: @230b 'bangs mos tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang pa de ni 'di lags so //
T09TD4154E:230b-1: des na nang du zhugs te zla ba chu shel gyi nor bu'i rdo la rje'i sras mo bzhugs par mdzod cig /'dren mas /
T09TD4154E:230b-2: de ltar byas te shugs nar phyung nas bdag nyid kyis rtogs par /
T09TD4154E:230b-3: bcom ldan me tog gi mtshon dang ldan pa gang gi gzugs kyis pham par byas pa de la ci yang mi bgyid par gnod pa ma byas shing bud med du gyur pa dag la bsnun par bgyid /
T09TD4154E:230b-4: ngo tsha ba ma mchis sam zhes te myos pa'i gnas skabs kyi gar dag byed do //
T09TD4154E:230b-5: gsal bar nges par byas nas bu mo ci'i phyir yal 'dab stug bos nyi ma'i 'od zer sgrib pa dang ldan pa'i tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang pa 'di dag ding bdag gdung ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed /
T09TD4154E:230b-6: 'bang smos 'dzum dang bcas par gdung ba'i rgyu ni bdag gis shes te /
T09TD4154E:230b-8: bdag la thugs mi ches pas khas len bar mi 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:230b-10: bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'dis bdag mtshon yang re zhig dri bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:230b-12: bu mo re zhig de dag gis ci /
T09TD4154E:230b-13: de'i rgyu ci yin bdag smros shig /'bangs mos /
T09TD4154E:230b-14: rje'i sras mo 'di ni khyod kyi snying la 'dod pa'i mchog /'dren mas brtabs pa dang bcas shing dga' ba dang bcas par langs te /
T09TD4154E:230b-15: mdun du gom pa gnyis gsum song nas de gang na gang na /
T09TD4154E:230b-17: 'dzum pa dang bcas par rje'i sras mo ci lags /
T09TD4154E:230b-19: ngo tsha dang bcas par 'dug ste kha 'og tu bltas nas 'khod do //
T09TD4154E:230b-20: 'bangs mos rje'i sras mo bdag ni 'di skad brjod par 'dod de /
T09TD4154E:230b-21: 'di ni khyod kyi snying la 'dod pa'i mchog gdung ba'i rgyu yin pa gang gis na tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang pa rang bzhin gyis bsil yang khyod kyi gdung ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mi nus so //
T09TD4154E:230b-22: 'dren mas dga' pa dang bcas par 'bangs mo la 'khyud nas /
T09TD4154E:230b-23: bu mo grung mo khyod ni nges par grung mo ste /
T09TD4154E:230b-24: gzhan pa ci zhig dri bar bya /
T09TD4154E:230b-25: des na smros shig /'bangs mo rje'i sras mo da lta nyid khyod la smras pa yin no //
T09TD4154E:230b-26: des na mchog lta bas byas pa'i gdung ba 'dis re zhig gdung bar ma byed cig / gal te bdag grung mo yin pa de lta na de yang rje'i sras mo mthong ba med par yud tsam yang gzhan du mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:231a-1: bdag gis shes pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:231a-2: 'dren mas mchi ma dang bcas par bu mo de lta bu'i skal ba bdag lag la yod /
T09TD4154E:231a-3: 'bangs mos rje'i sras mo de skad ci la gsungs /
T09TD4154E:231a-4: khyab 'jug brang gi gzhi la dpal mo 'dzin pa yang bde bar ji ltar 'gyur /
T09TD4154E:231a-5: 'dren mas skye bo legs pa ngag snyan pa bor nas /
T09TD4154E:231a-6: gzhan smra bar byed dam ci /
T09TD4154E:231a-7: bu mo bdag gi gdung ba 'di bas kyang 'di shin tu lhag par gzir ba ste /
T09TD4154E:231a-8: gang gzi byin chen po de la tshig tsam gyis kyang dga' bar ma byas pa bdag tshul dang mthun pa ma yin par mkhyen to zhes te dus so //
T09TD4154E:231a-9: 'bangs mos mchi ma dang bcas par rje'i sras mo ma bshums shig / langs nas yal 'dab blangs nas btsir te khu ba snying gar byugs so //
T09TD4154E:231a-12: ma bshums shig / nu ma'i ngos la byugs pa tsan dan yal 'dab kyi thang chu 'di ni nges par rgyun chad med par 'bab pa mchi ma'i thigs pa 'di dag gis dro bar byas pas khyod kyi snying ga'i gdung ba mi sel lo zhes te chu shing gi 'dab ma dag gis g-yo par byed do //
T09TD4154E:231a-15: bu mo ma g-yob ma g-yob chu shing gi 'dab ma'i rlung 'di ni shin tu tsha'o //
T09TD4154E:231a-16: 'bangs mos rje'i sras mo 'di'i skyon du ma byed cig //
T09TD4154E:231a-17: 'di ltar snyam zhing stug pa'i tsan dan 'khri shing yal 'dab dang 'grogs pa chu shing gi 'dab ma'i rlung 'di ni shin tu bsil yang khyod nyid kyi dbugs kyis tsha bar byas so //
T09TD4154E:231a-18: 'dren mas mchi ma dang bcas par bu mo sdug bsngal 'di nye bar zhi ba'i thabs 'ga' zhig yod dam /
T09TD4154E:231a-19: 'bangs mos rje'i sras mo gal te de nyid 'dir 'ongs na yod pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:231a-21: bi d'u sha ka dag zhugs so //
T09TD4154E:231a-23: phyir log dkar dang dkar min mig gi 'od kyis bsti gnas shing de rnams //
T09TD4154E:231a-24: yal ga la chags ri dags pags pa'i tshogs kyis sgeg pa bzhin byed cing //
T09TD4154E:231a-25: thub pa'i sngon du bdag la bltas pa gang de nyid kyis bdag ni bcom gyur na //
T09TD4154E:231a-26: me tog mda' can khyod kyis don med mda' 'di dag ni ci slad 'phen par byed //
T09TD4154E:231a-28: kye grogs po nges par khyod kyi brtan pa gang du song /
T09TD4154E:231a-30: grogs po bdag la brtan pa yod pa nyid ma yin nam /
T09TD4154E:231b-0: zla bas dag pa'i mtshan las min nam ci zhig @231b autpa la sngon po ma bsnams sam //
T09TD4154E:231b-1: rab rgyas dz'a ti'i me tog dri ldang srod la'i rlung dag bzod pa min nam ci //
T09TD4154E:231b-2: pad tshal sbrang rtsi byed pa'i dar dir sgra dag ci zhig bdag gis ma mnyan nam //
T09TD4154E:231b-3: gdung ba dag gis gnod med bdag la mi brten pa zhes gang gis khyod rjod byed //
T09TD4154E:231b-4: yang ni grogs po aa ti'i rigs bdag gis yang dag par ma brjod do //
T09TD4154E:231b-5: lus med kyis 'phangs pa me tog gi mda' ni bud med kyi snying gis kyang bzod pa ma yin nam /
T09TD4154E:231b-6: gang gis na de ring khyod kyi mdun du bdag gis bstan pa yin no zhes brjod par bya /
T09TD4154E:231b-8: bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'di ltar brtan pa med pa nyid du yang khas len cing /
T09TD4154E:231b-9: 'dis snying la gdung ba chen po gnas pa dag gsal bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:231b-10: des na re zhig ji ltar yang 'di g-yeng bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:231b-11: gsal bar kye grogs po ding khyod bla ma'i bsnyen bkur myur ba nyid du byas nas ci'i slad du 'dir 'ongs /
T09TD4154E:231b-13: grogs po gnas dag dris te gzhan su zhig la 'di smra bar bya /
T09TD4154E:231b-14: ding bdag gi rmi lam du shes pa ni dga' ma'i mchog de nyid mdzub mos ston cing tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang pa zla ba chu shel gyi stan 'di la 'dug nas mdza' bas khros te /
T09TD4154E:231b-15: bdag la 'ga' zhig smod bzhin du du zhing 'dug pa bdag gis mthong ngo //
T09TD4154E:231b-16: des na rmi lam du dga' ma dang 'grogs pa'i dga' ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i gnas 'di nyid du nyi ma bskyal bar 'dod do //
T09TD4154E:231b-17: de'i phyir tshur sheg de nyid du 'gro bar bya'o zhes te song ngo //
T09TD4154E:231b-18: 'bangs mos rings pa dang bcas par thos nas rje'i sras mo rkang pa'i sgra 'dra ba dag thos so //
T09TD4154E:231b-19: 'dren mas rings pa dang bcas par bdag nyid la blta zhing /
T09TD4154E:231b-20: bu mo bdag gi spyod pa 'di 'dra ba 'di mthong nas 'di 'ga' zhig gis bdag gi sems rig par 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:231b-21: des na shing mya ngan med pa dmar po'i khrod 'dir 'dug ste /
T09TD4154E:231b-22: 'di dag su zhig yin blta bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:231b-25: 'di ni tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang pa ste /
T09TD4154E:231b-27: gar gyis rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:231b-29: tsan dan 'khri shing dag gi khang pa ni //
T09TD4154E:231b-30: zla ba nor bu'i rdo dang ldan mod kyang //
T09TD4154E:231b-31: zla bzhin ma bral 'di la bdag mi dga' //
T09TD4154E:231b-32: zla 'od dang bral mtshan mo'i sgo bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:232a-1: sras mo dga' ba 'phel bar mdzod cig / khyod kyi snying sdug de ni 'di nyid do //
T09TD4154E:232a-2: 'dren mas mthong nas dga' ba dang bcas shing rtabs pa dang bcas par bu mo 'di mthong bar shin tu 'jigs pa'i phyir /
T09TD4154E:232a-3: 'di dang shin tu nye bar 'dug mi bzod do //
T09TD4154E:232a-4: gal te na 'dis bdag mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:232a-5: des na tshur sheg gzhan du 'gro'o //
T09TD4154E:232a-6: byin pa 'dar ba dang bcas par rkang pa bkod nas /
T09TD4154E:232a-8: bdag gi byin pa dag 'dar ro //
T09TD4154E:232a-10: shin tu skrag ma 'dir 'khod kyang khyod su zhig gis mthong /
T09TD4154E:232a-11: shing mya ngan med pa dmar po'i khrod na gnas pa dag brjed dam /
T09TD4154E:232a-12: des na 'di nyid du 'khod la 'dug cig / de ltar byas so //
T09TD4154E:232a-14: brtags nas kye grogs po zla ba nor bu'i rdo lam de 'di yin nam /
T09TD4154E:232a-15: 'dren mas mchi ma dang bcas par shugs ring phyung ngo //
T09TD4154E:232a-16: 'bangs mos rje'i sras mo 'di 'di zhes pa'i gtam dag thos so //
T09TD4154E:232a-17: des na nges par brtags la mnyan par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:232a-20: lag pa bskyod cig / kye grogs po zla ba nor bu'i rdo lam de 'di yin nam byas pa na /
T09TD4154E:232a-22: yang dag par mtshon cing lag pas bstan nas /
T09TD4154E:232a-23: lag g-yon yal 'dab dag la rnam par dkar ba'i gdong pa bzhag nas ni //
T09TD4154E:232a-24: shugs ring dbugs 'byin yid la khro ba nges byas smin ma dag / cung zad bskyod cing yun ring thogs pa bdag la bsam pa gsal byas pa'i //
T09TD4154E:232a-25: dga' ma gang du bdag gis mthong ba'i zla ba nor bu'i rdo 'di'o //
T09TD4154E:232a-26: de'i phyir zla ba nor bu'i rdo 'di nyid la 'dug par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:232a-31: 'dis sems par byed pa de su zhig yin /
T09TD4154E:232a-33: rje'i sras mo ji ltar yu bu cag gis bsgribs nas 'di dag mthong ba de bzhin nyid du /
T09TD4154E:232a-34: khyod kyang 'di dag gis mthong ba yin pa srid do //
T09TD4154E:232a-37: 'on kyang mdza' bas khro ba'i dga' ma'i skye bo snying la byas nas rjod par byed do //
T09TD4154E:232a-39: 'di 'dra ba'i dogs pa ma byed cig / da dung re zhig mnyan par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:232a-41: bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'di'i gtam 'di ni mngon par dga'o //
T09TD4154E:232a-42: des na 'di nyid 'phel du gzhug par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:232b-0: @232b gsal bar kye grogs po de nas du ba dang bcas pa de la khyod kyis ci zhig smras /
T09TD4154E:232b-1: 'dren pas grogs po bdag gis 'di skad brjod de /
T09TD4154E:232b-2: zla ba chu shel rdo dag ni //
T09TD4154E:232b-3: mchi ma'i chu yis bran pa 'di //
T09TD4154E:232b-4: khyod kyi bzhin gyi zla ba dag / shar ba 'di yis bzhu ba bzhin //
T09TD4154E:232b-6: khro ba dang bcas par grung mo 'di las kyang gzhan mnyan par bya ba yod dam //
T09TD4154E:232b-7: mchi ma dang bcas par tshur sheg 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:232b-8: 'bangs mos rje'i sras mo de ltar ma sems shig / gang gis khyod mthong ba des gzhan du yang brjod do zhes bya ba la bdag yid mi ches so //
T09TD4154E:232b-9: des na gtam gyi mthar thug pa re zhig brtag par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:232b-10: 'dren pas grogs po rdo ba'i gzhi 'di la de nyid bris te /
T09TD4154E:232b-11: ri mor gyur pa de dang bdag nyid rtse zhing 'dug par bya'o snyam mo //
T09TD4154E:232b-12: des na ri'i ngos 'di nyid nas /
T09TD4154E:232b-13: ldong ros kyi dum bu dag long la shog cig / grogs po gang khyod gsung ba'o //
T09TD4154E:232b-15: kye khyod kyi kha dog ci long zhes gsungs nas /
T09TD4154E:232b-16: bdag gis ni ri 'di las rnyed sla ba'i tshon kha dog lnga yang blangs te mchis so //
T09TD4154E:232b-17: des na legs par bris shig ces gtad do //
T09TD4154E:232b-18: 'dren pas grogs po legs par byas so //
T09TD4154E:232b-19: blangs nas mngon par bris te spu long dang ldan par grogs po ltos shig ltos shig / mnyams [*ma nyams?] bim pa ltar mdzes mchu //
T09TD4154E:232b-20: mig gi dga' ston dga' ma yi //
T09TD4154E:232b-21: bzhin ras ri bong can gyi bzhin //
T09TD4154E:232b-22: dang po mthong 'dis sems dga' byed //
T09TD4154E:232b-25: ya mtshan dang bcas par 'di ni ya mtshan che ste /
T09TD4154E:232b-26: kye grogs po mngon sum du gyur pa ma yin yang de ltar mngon par 'dri ba ni ya mtshan che'o //
T09TD4154E:232b-29: dga' ma 'di yang kun rtog la //
T09TD4154E:232b-30: gnas pa dag ni nye ba nyid //
T09TD4154E:232b-31: de ba ltas bltas shing 'dri ba gang //
T09TD4154E:232b-32: 'di la ya mtshan ci zhig yod //
T09TD4154E:232b-34: shugs ring phyung zhing mche ma dang bcas par grung mo nges par gtam gyi mjug tu gyur to //
T09TD4154E:232b-35: des na tshur sheg / re zhig jo bo bshes gnyen gyi dbyig kyang blta bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:232b-36: 'bangs mos yid 'byung ba dang bcas shing rang gis rtog par 'di'i gtam ni srog la yang ltos pa med pa bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:232b-37: gsal bar rje'i sras mo der me tog sar pa can song ba ma yin nam /
T09TD4154E:233a-0: des na gal te jo bo bshes @233a * //
T09TD4154E:233a-1: gnyen gyi dbyig 'di nyid du 'ong ba yang srid do //
T09TD4154E:233a-2: des na bshes gnyen gyi dbyig zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:233a-3: yab kyis bdag la bka' stsal pa /
T09TD4154E:233a-4: bu bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gzhon nu sprin gyi bzhon pa bdag gis yongs su brtag pa byas te 'di nyid na nye bar gnas so //
T09TD4154E:233a-5: 'di ni bdag cag gi mag par 'os pa yin pas /
T09TD4154E:233a-6: de la bu mo ma la ya can ma sbyin par gyis shig / bdag ni byams pa'i dbang du gyur pas gzhan pa'i gnas skabs 'ga' zhig kyang sems par byed de gang gi phyir /
T09TD4154E:233a-7: gang zhig rig 'dzin rgyal rigs thig le shes rab dam pa'i 'dod pa ngag dang ldan //
T09TD4154E:233a-8: gzugs ni zla yod ma yin pha rol gnon pa'i nor ldan mkhas shing dul la gzhon //
T09TD4154E:233a-9: gang yang snying rjes sems can don la mngon sbyor srog kyang kun du gtong ba des //
T09TD4154E:233a-10: de la mtshungs med sring mo sbyin la dga' ba dang ni chags bral dang yang ldan //
T09TD4154E:233a-11: ji ltar sprin gyi bzhon pa 'di goo r'i'i bsti gnas dang nye ba tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang pa 'di nyid na gnas so zhes bya ba yang bdag gis thos so //
T09TD4154E:233a-12: des na tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang pa 'di nyid du 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:233a-13: bltas nas zhugs te gar byed do //
T09TD4154E:233a-15: rings pa dang bcas par mthong nas kye grogs po chu shing gi 'dab ma 'dis ri mor gyur pa 'di sgribs shig /
T09TD4154E:233a-16: grub pa'i rgyal tshab bshes gnyen gyi dbyig 'di 'dir nges par 'ongs te /
T09TD4154E:233a-17: gal te na mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:233a-19: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig nye bar btud nas gzhon du bshes gnyen gyi dbyig phyag bgyid do //
T09TD4154E:233a-21: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig legs par 'das sam /
T09TD4154E:233a-23: rje'i sras mo jo bo bshes gnyen gyi dbyig ni byon pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:233a-26: 'dren pas bshes gnyen gyi dbyig grub pa'i rgyal po kun gyi dbyig dge'am /
T09TD4154E:233a-27: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis dge'o //
T09TD4154E:233a-28: yab kyi gsung nyid kyis bdag ni khyod kyi mngon du 'ongs so //
T09TD4154E:233a-29: 'dren pas grub pa'i rgyal po lags bdag la ci zhig gsung /
T09TD4154E:233a-31: re zhig yab kyis ci zhig gsungs pa dag mnyan par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:233a-32: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis dga' ba dang bcas par yab ni 'di skad gsung ste /
T09TD4154E:233b-0: bdag gi bu mo ma la ya can zhes bya ba grub @233b pa'i rgyal rigs thams cad kyi srog lta bu de bdag gis khyod la sbyin gyis blangs par mdzod cig ces so //
T09TD4154E:233b-1: 'bangs mos bgad nas rje'i sras mo da ni khro bar ma mdzad cig /'dren mas bu mo tshim par ma byed cig /'dren pas /
T09TD4154E:233b-2: skye bos dben par grog po dog pa dag tu ltung bar gyur na /
T09TD4154E:233b-3: bdag gis ci zhig smra bar bya /
T09TD4154E:233b-5: kye khyod kyis sems de ma gtogs pa gzhan pa dag la mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur ba bdag gis shes so //
T09TD4154E:233b-6: de lta na yang 'di la gang cung zad smros la gtang bar mdzod cig /'dren mas /
T09TD4154E:233b-7: khro ba dang bcas par kye 'bangs dag de sus mi shes /
T09TD4154E:233b-9: khyed lta bu dang lhan cig 'brel pa bsngags par 'os pa 'di 'dra bdag / su zhig mi 'dod /
T09TD4154E:233b-10: 'on kyang gzhan du zhugs pa'i sems dag gzhan du rab tu 'jug par byed par mi nus so //
T09TD4154E:233b-11: de'i phyir bdag ni 'di len par spro ba med do //
T09TD4154E:233b-13: rmongs pa'i gar dag byed do //
T09TD4154E:233b-15: rje'i sras mo dag rab tu ston cig rab tu ston cig / bi d'u sha kas /
T09TD4154E:233b-16: 'di ni nges par gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa zhig ste /
T09TD4154E:233b-17: brjod pa 'di dag gis ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:233b-18: song ste bla ma'i skye bo de nyid la don du gnyer bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:233b-20: bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'dis legs par brjod de /
T09TD4154E:233b-21: 'di ni bla ma dag gi gsung las 'da' ba ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:233b-24: nye ba 'di nyid na rab tu gnas so //
T09TD4154E:233b-25: des na re zhig song ste /
T09TD4154E:233b-26: 'di'i pha ma dag la ma la ya can ma len du gzhug par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:233b-27: 'dren ma dbugs phyin par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:233b-28: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis gsal bar 'di skad smra bar byed pa'i bdag nyid /
T09TD4154E:233b-29: bdag cag rnams 'gog par byed cing gzhon nu nyid kyis shin tu mang bar mkhyen to //
T09TD4154E:233b-31: ji ltar smad cing zhan par slar yang bshes gnyen gyi dbyig smra bar byed //
T09TD4154E:233b-32: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:233b-34: mchi ma dang bcas shing bdag nyid kyis rtogs par /
T09TD4154E:233b-35: skal ba ngan pa'i rnyog pas dri mar byas shing /
T09TD4154E:233b-37: sdug bsngal bsten pa bdag gi lus 'dis ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:233b-38: des na shing mya ngan med pa 'di nyid la /
T09TD4154E:234a-2: bdag nyid 'chi bar 'gyur ba de ltar re zhig bya'o //
T09TD4154E:234a-3: gsal bar 'dzum pas bu mo re zhig bshes gnyen gyi dbyig ring du song ngam ma song rtogs shig / de nas bdag cag kyang 'di nas 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:234a-5: bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'di'i sems ni gzhan pa zhig yod pa 'dra'o //
T09TD4154E:234a-6: des na 'di nyid nas bsgribs te /
T09TD4154E:234a-7: 'di ci zhig byed pa dag blta bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:234a-8: gsal bar rje'i sras mo gang gsung ba nyid do zhes te /
T09TD4154E:234a-9: thon nas gom pa 'ga' zhig song zhing bsgribs te gnas so //
T09TD4154E:234a-11: phyogs su bltas nas grung mo song ba dang 'khri shing gi zhags pa dag byas nas /
T09TD4154E:234a-12: mchi ma dang bcas par bcom ldan ma goo r'i gal te khyod kyis skye ba 'di la bka' drin mdzad na yang /
T09TD4154E:234a-13: re zhig skye ba gzhan la ji ltar 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig ces te mgrin pa la zhags pa bcug go //
T09TD4154E:234a-14: 'bangs mos mthong nas rings pa dang bcas par jo bo jo bo skyobs shig skyobs shig / nges par rje'i sras mo 'di ni bdag nyid dbyangs te 'chi bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:234a-18: mya ngan med pa'i shing 'di la'o //
T09TD4154E:234a-19: 'dren pas mthong nas dga' ba dang bcas par aa ye bdag cag gi yid la re ba'i sa gzhi de ni 'di yin no //
T09TD4154E:234a-20: 'dren ma'i lag pa nas bzung ste zhags pa 'grol zhing /
T09TD4154E:234a-21: ma byed ma byed mdzes ma thub chod bya ba 'di //
T09TD4154E:234a-22: 'khri shing yal 'dab rtse yi lag pa 'di dag thong //
T09TD4154E:234a-23: gang gi me tog dag kyang btu bar nus min pa //
T09TD4154E:234a-24: de yis khyod ni 'chi slad zhags pa ji ltar 'dzin //
T09TD4154E:234a-26: 'jigs pa dang bcas par kye ma smad do //
T09TD4154E:234a-28: 'di su zhig / nges par brtags nas khro ba dang bcas par lag pa 'grol zhing bdag zlog par byed pa'i //
T09TD4154E:234a-29: lag pa'i rtse mo dag thong shig thong shig /'chi ba yang khyod nyid la don du gnyer bar byed dam ci /
T09TD4154E:234a-32: gang gi khyod mgrin do shal gyi //
T09TD4154E:234a-33: 'khri shing 'os la zhags pa bcug / gnod pa dang bcas bzung ba yi //
T09TD4154E:234a-34: lag pa 'di ni ji ltar gtong //
T09TD4154E:234b-0: kye grung mo khyod kyi rje'i sras mo 'di 'chi ba la mngon par zhen pa'i rgyu dag @234b ci zhig yin //
T09TD4154E:234b-2: khyod kyi grogs po 'di nyid rgyu yin no //
T09TD4154E:234b-5: da [*de?] nyid 'chi ba'i rgyu dag yin //
T09TD4154E:234b-6: 'di ni nges par mi shes so //
T09TD4154E:234b-8: kye bu mo de ji ltar /
T09TD4154E:234b-10: khro ba dang bcas par khyod kyi dga' ba'i grogs pos /
T09TD4154E:234b-11: snying gi dga' grogs su zhig / rdo ba'i gzhil bris pa de nyid kyi phyogs su lhung ba 'dis /
T09TD4154E:234b-12: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis byin par gyur kyang /
T09TD4154E:234b-13: bdag ma bzhed par gyur to zhes mya ngan skyes te /
T09TD4154E:234b-14: 'di 'di lta bur gdung bar gyur tam snyam mo //
T09TD4154E:234b-16: dga' ba dang bcas shing bdag nyid kyis rtogs par ji ltar kun gyi dbyig gi bu mo ma la ya can ma de 'di nyid yin nam /
T09TD4154E:234b-17: yang na zla ba tshes pa rin chen 'byung gnas las gzhan gang las 'khrungs par 'gyur /
T09TD4154E:234b-18: kye ma yud tsam zhig gis bdag ma bslus so //
T09TD4154E:234b-20: kye bu mo gal te de lta yin na bdag gi grogs po nyes pa med pa zhig ste /
T09TD4154E:234b-21: 'di nyid der bris pa yin no //
T09TD4154E:234b-22: ci ste de ltar yid mi ches na /
T09TD4154E:234b-23: bu mo khyed nyid der song la rdo ba'i gzhi la blta bar byos shig /'dren mas /
T09TD4154E:234b-24: dga' ba dang bcas shing ngo tsha ba dang bcas par 'dren pa la blta zhing lag pa 'dren par byed do //
T09TD4154E:234b-26: ji srid bdag gis snying gi dga' ma rdo ba'i gzhi la mngon par bris pa ma mthong ba de srid du mi gtong ngo zhes te thams cad der song ngo //
T09TD4154E:234b-28: chu shing gi 'dab ma bsal nas ltos shig ltos shig /'di nyid 'di'i snying gi dga' ma'o //
T09TD4154E:234b-30: nges par brtags nas grung mo nga lta bu zhig bris pa 'dra'o /
T09TD4154E:234b-31: 'bangs mos nges par brtags nas rje'i sras mo nga 'dra ba zhig bris so zhes ci ste gsung /
T09TD4154E:234b-32: 'di khyod 'dra ba ni gang gis na ci /
T09TD4154E:234b-33: re zhig rdo ba'i gzhi 'di la rje'i sras mo khyod kyi gzugs brnyan dag 'phos pa yin nam 'on te khyod bris pa yin yang yongs su mi shes so //
T09TD4154E:234b-34: 'dren mas bgad nas 'di yi ri mor gyur pa 'di ston par byed pa ni bdag gis ngan pa'i lugs dag byas so //
T09TD4154E:234b-36: gye grogs po da ni khyod kyi dri za'i bag ma dag rdzogs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:234b-37: da ni 'di'i lag pa'i rtse mo dag thong shig /'dren pas de ltar byed do //
T09TD4154E:234b-39: do ra las phyir mngon par phyogs te /
T09TD4154E:235a-1: nas nges par rings pa rings par 'di nyid du 'ong ba 'di su zhig yin //
T09TD4154E:235a-3: dga' ba dang bcas par nye bar btud nas /
T09TD4154E:235a-4: rje'i sras mo dag dgyes pa 'phel bar mdzod cig / mnga' bdag gzhon nu sprin gyi bzhon pa'i bla ma dag gis gus pa dang bcas par dga' ba'i grogs la /
T09TD4154E:235a-7: dga' ba dang bcas par dga' ba'i grogs kyi yid la re ba rdzogs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:235a-8: yang na de ma yin te /
T09TD4154E:235a-9: ma la ya can ma khyod nyid kyi'o //
T09TD4154E:235a-10: yang na bram ze bdag nyid kyi'o zhes te /
T09TD4154E:235a-11: zas kyi mngon par sbyor pa'i gar dag byed do //
T09TD4154E:235a-13: rgyal tshab bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis bdag la gsungs pa /
T09TD4154E:235a-14: di ring nyid ma la ya can ma ni bag ma'o //
T09TD4154E:235a-15: des na bkra shis kyis khrus kyi don du myur bar bos la shog shig ces so //
T09TD4154E:235a-16: de'i phyir byon cig gshegs par bgyi'o //
T09TD4154E:235a-18: 'bangs mo'i bu mo nges par khyod 'di bos te song nas 'di dag 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'am ci /
T09TD4154E:235a-20: aa ai rings par ma byed cig / khyed rnams kyi yang khrus kyi rdzas dag 'ong ba nyid do //
T09TD4154E:235a-21: 'dren mas sgeg pa dang bcas par 'dren pa blta zhing song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:235a-22: phyi rol nas bstod pa mkhan klog par byed do //
T09TD4154E:235a-23: bi sha ta ka'i char gyis lhun po dang mtshungs mdzes pa 'dzin pa ma la ya dag la //
T09TD4154E:235a-24: gser dang nor bu'i rkang gdub sgra ldan yid 'ong snyan sgrogs bud med rnams kyi glu ldan pa //
T09TD4154E:235a-25: khyod kyi bag ma'i khrus kyi dus ni grub pa'i slad du grub pa'i 'jig rten li khri yi //
T09TD4154E:235a-26: rdul bkod nyin mo rab tu rtsom pa'i mtshams kyi nyi 'od dpal dang ldan rnams sgrogs par byed //
T09TD4154E:235a-27: bi d'u sha kas thos nas /
T09TD4154E:235a-28: kye grogs po ae ma 'di ni khyod kyi khrus kyi rdzas dag 'ongs pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:235a-29: 'dren pas dga' ba dang bcas par grogs po da ni 'dir 'dug nas ci zhig bya //
T09TD4154E:235a-30: des na tshur shig yab la phyag 'tshal te khrus kyi gzhi nyid du 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:235a-31: phyi rol nas slar yang bstod pa pos /
T09TD4154E:235a-32: gzugs dang rjes chags rigs na tshod //
T09TD4154E:235a-33: mthun par phan tshun mthong byas pa //
T09TD4154E:235a-34: bsod nams ldan pa 'ga' zhig nyid //
T09TD4154E:235a-36: zhes te song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:235b-2: // / de nas rab tu 'bar ba'i chas dang ldan zhing lag na chang gi snod gzung ba'i bi ta dang /
T09TD4154E:235b-5: gang zhig rtag tu chang 'thung dang //
T09TD4154E:235b-6: gang yang dga' mar 'grogs byed pa //
T09TD4154E:235b-7: stobs kyi lha dang 'dod lha ste //
T09TD4154E:235b-8: skye bo'i lha gnyis che ba nyid//
T09TD4154E:235b-9: zur phud can bdag gis 'tsho ba ni bsngags par 'os pa yin te /
T09TD4154E:235b-10: brang gi gzhi la dga' ma dang //
T09TD4154E:235b-11: kha la autpal sngos bsgos chang //
T09TD4154E:235b-12: mgo la me tog zur phud dag / gang la rtag tu gnas pa'o //
T09TD4154E:235b-13: yongs su 'gyel zhing kye sus nga la 'bul zhing yod /
T09TD4154E:235b-14: nges par me tog gsar pa can yin no zhes dgod do ;
T09TD4154E:235b-16: jo bo de ni ma 'ongs so //
T09TD4154E:235b-18: khro ba dang bcas par srod la dang po nyid la ma la ya can gyi bag ma'i bkra shis dag tshar ro //
T09TD4154E:235b-19: des na yugs mo de da dung ci'i phyir mi 'ong /
T09TD4154E:235b-20: rnam par bsams nas dga' ba dang bcas par yang na di ring ma la ya can ma'i bag ma'i dga' ston chen po 'di la grub pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten thams cad rang rang gi dga' ba'i skye bo dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas su chang 'thung ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed cing yod do //
T09TD4154E:235b-21: de nyid na me tog sar pa can yang bdag lta zhing yod dam snyam mo //
T09TD4154E:235b-22: des na de nyid du 'gro bar bya ste /
T09TD4154E:235b-23: me tog sar pa med pa'i zur phud kyis ci byed /
T09TD4154E:235b-25: 'bangs kyis nges par skyed mos tshal 'dir 'jug par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:235b-27: de nas bi d'u sha kas phrag pa la gos zung dag bkod de zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:235b-29: dga' ba'i grogs po di ring skyed mos tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis thos so //
T09TD4154E:235b-30: des na skyed mos tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas 'dir re zhig 'jug par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:235b-31: zhugs nas bung ba 'bab pa'i tshul gyis gar dag byed do //
T09TD4154E:235b-32: gzir ba dang bcas par ci'i phyir sbrang rtsi'i byed pa 'di dag bdag nyid la mngon par 'bab par 'gyur /
T09TD4154E:235b-33: bdag nyid la mnos nas rig pa dag shes par gyur te /
T09TD4154E:235b-34: ma la ya can ma'i gnyen 'dun gyi skye bo'i mag pa'i dga' grogs yin no zhes gus pa dang bcas par byug pa rnams kyis byugs pa dang lha'i me tog rnams kyi cod pan dag byed do //
T09TD4154E:236a-0: des na shin tu gus par byas pa de dag da @236a * //
T09TD4154E:236a-1: ni 'dir gnod pa'i rgyur gyur to //
T09TD4154E:236a-2: des na 'dir bdag gis ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:236a-3: yang na ma la ya can ma las dngos su thob pa'i gos dmar zung gcig po 'di dag gis bud med bzhin yongs su g-yogs te /
T09TD4154E:236a-4: stod g-yogs kyis bcing ba byas nas 'gro bar byed de /
T09TD4154E:236a-5: re zhig 'bangs phrug ngan pa sbrang rtsi byed pa 'di dag gis bdag la ci zhig byed par 'gyur pa blta bar bya'o zhes te de ltar byed do //
T09TD4154E:236a-7: nges par brtags nas dga' ba dang bcas par ke ke 'bangs po sor mos ston cing dgod pa dang bcas par 'di ni nges par me tog sar pa can te /
T09TD4154E:236a-8: bdag mthong nas nga yun ring po zhig nas 'ong sa so zhes khros te /
T09TD4154E:236a-9: gos kyis g-yogs te sa gzhan du 'gro'o //
T09TD4154E:236a-10: des na ma tshor bar mgrin pa nas bzung ste 'di dang bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:236a-11: 'phral la nye bar btud de bzung na khar tam bu la spyin par 'dod do //
T09TD4154E:236a-13: chang gi dri tshor te sna bzung nas gdong gzhan du phyogs te /
T09TD4154E:236a-14: ji ltar na gcig tu sbrang rtsi byed pa rnams las ji lta ji ltar yang thar bar gyur na gzhan du ngan pa chang gis myos pa ngag gi khar ltung ngo //
T09TD4154E:236a-16: ji ltar khro bas gdong gzhan du phyogs par gyur phyag 'tshal bar byed cing /
T09TD4154E:236a-17: bi d'u sha ka'i rkang pa la bdag nyid kyi mgo bo gtugs nas bzod par mdzod cig / me tog sar pa can bzod par mdzod cig / de nas 'bangs mo zhugs par gyur te /
T09TD4154E:236a-18: rje'i sras mo'i mas bdag la gsungs pa /
T09TD4154E:236a-19: bu mo me tog sar pa can skyed mos tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas su song la /
T09TD4154E:236a-20: skyed mos tshal bsrung ba la yal 'dab can ma la di ring khyad par bcas par shing ta ma la'i gnas dag legs par bstar bar byos shig / ma la ya can ma dang bcas pa'i mag pa dag der 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes smros shig ces so //
T09TD4154E:236a-21: bdag gi yal 'dab can ma la smras zin te /
T09TD4154E:236a-22: das na re zhig mtshan mo bral bas sred pa 'phel ba'i mdza' bo zur phud can la blta bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:236a-23: mthong nas khro ba dang bcas par ji ltar bud med gzhan su zhig la dang par byed /
T09TD4154E:236a-25: seng ge 'phrog byed mes po dag la yang //
T09TD4154E:236a-26: 'dud par mi byed khengs dang ldan pa gang //
T09TD4154E:236a-27: zur phud can des me tog sar pa can //
T09TD4154E:236a-28: khyod kyi rkang bdag la gtugs gyur to //
T09TD4154E:236b-0: bi d'u sha kas khro pa dang bcas par 'bangs phrug chang @236b gis myos pa /
T09TD4154E:236b-1: 'di na me tog sar ba can gang na yod /
T09TD4154E:236b-3: brtags nas 'jum pa dang bcas par ji ltar myos pa dang bcas /
T09TD4154E:236b-4: 'dod pa'i gzhan dbang du gyur pa'i zur phung can gyi jo bo aa tre'i rigs la da yin par byas nas dang bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:236b-5: des na re zhig kyal ka'i khro bar byas te /
T09TD4154E:236b-6: 'di gnyi ga la tho btsams par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:236b-7: 'bangs kyis mthong nas lag pas bskyod cing jo bo thong shig /'di ni me tog sar ba can ma yin te /
T09TD4154E:236b-8: me tog sar pa can de ni khro bas dmar ba'i mig gis blta zhing 'ongs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:236b-9: 'bangs mos zur phud can 'di nges par su zhig la dang bar byed /
T09TD4154E:236b-10: bi d'u sha kas gos kyis dkris pa dag 'grol zhing skal ba ngan par gyur pa'i bu bdag go //
T09TD4154E:236b-12: bi d'u sha ka la nges par brtags nas /
T09TD4154E:236b-13: kye'i spre'u ser skya khyod kyis kyang zur phud can bdag bslus so //
T09TD4154E:236b-14: 'bangs ji srid du me tog sar pa can dang bar gyur pa de srid du 'di zung shig /'bangs kyis rje gang gsungs pa nyid do ;
T09TD4154E:236b-16: bi d'u sha kas btang nas 'bangs mo'i rkang pa dag la gtugs te dang bar mdzod cig / me tog sar pa can dang par mdzod cig / bi d'u sha kas bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'di ni bdag 'bros pa'i gnas skabs yin no zhes te /
T09TD4154E:236b-18: 'bangs kyis bi d'u sha ka'i tshangs skud nas bzung bas tshangs skud chad par gyur to /
T09TD4154E:236b-19: spre'u ser skya gang dang gang du 'bros //
T09TD4154E:236b-20: stod g-yogs kyis mgrin pa nas btags te drang ngo //
T09TD4154E:236b-22: bu mo me tog sar pa can ma bdag la bka' drin mdzod la gtong du chug cig /'bangs mos bgad nas gal te sa la mgo bo bkod nas bdag gi rkang pa dag la gtugs na'o //
T09TD4154E:236b-23: bi d'u sha kas khro ba dang bcas par ji ltar rgyal po'i grogs por gyur nas 'bangs kyi bu mo khyod kyi rkang pa la gtugs par byed /
T09TD4154E:236b-24: 'bangs mos mdzub mo 'dzugs shing 'dzum pa dang bcas par da lta nyid khyod gtugs par 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:236b-25: zur phud can longs shig / khyod la bdag rab tu dang bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:236b-27: 'di ni mag pa'i dga' grogs te de la khyod kyis ngan pa dag byas so //
T09TD4154E:236b-28: de dag gal te gsan na jo bo bshes gnyen gyi dbyig khro bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:236b-29: des na 'di ni gus pa dang bcas par mchod de gtang bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:237a-1: ji ltar me tog sar pa can gsungs pa bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:237a-2: bi d'u sha ka'i mgrin pa nas bzung ste /
T09TD4154E:237a-3: kye khyod ni dga' grogs kyi 'brel pa yin par byas te /
T09TD4154E:237a-4: bdag gis kya la ka dag byas so //
T09TD4154E:237a-5: 'khor zhing nges par zur phud can myos pa yin nam ci /
T09TD4154E:237a-6: des na bzhad gad dag byas pa yin no //
T09TD4154E:237a-7: stod g-yogs bzlums te stan du byin nas /
T09TD4154E:237a-8: 'brel ba dag 'dir bzhugs shig / bi d'u sha kas /
T09TD4154E:237a-9: ae ma ho 'di ni myos pas gzir ba dang bral bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:237a-12: me tog sar pa can khyod kyang 'di'i logs nyid du nye bar 'dug cig / gang gis na khyod gnyi ga yang mnyam pa nyid du bdag gis mchod par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:237a-15: 'bangs dag chang gi snod 'di chang dag gis gang bar byos shig /'bangs kyis gar byed cing gang bar byas so //
T09TD4154E:237a-17: rang gi mgo'i zur phud las me tog blangs nas chang gi snod du bkod de pus mo dag btsugs nas me tog sar pa can la nye bar bstabs te /
T09TD4154E:237a-18: bi d'u sha ka la bltas nas me tog sar pa can gyi kha yi reg pa khyad par du ro 'phel bar gyur pa zur phud can las gzhan su yis kyang sngar ma myong ba yin no //
T09TD4154E:237a-19: de bas na 'di 'thung shig / khyod la 'di las gzhan pa'i bkur sti bya ba ci zhig yod /
T09TD4154E:237a-21: skyengs pa'i 'dzum dag byas nas zur phud can nges par bdag ni bram ze yin no //
T09TD4154E:237a-23: gal te khyod bram ze yin na khyod kyi tshangs skud ga re /
T09TD4154E:237a-27: gal te de lta yin na rig byed kyi yi ge 'ga' zhig rjod cig / bi d'u sha kas /
T09TD4154E:237a-28: bu mo chang gi dris bdag gi rig byed kyi yi ge dag nyams par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:237a-29: yang na bu mo khyod la rtsod pa 'dis bdag la ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:237a-30: bram ze bdag khyod kyi rkang pa dag la gtug go zhes te /
T09TD4154E:237a-31: rkang pa dag la gtugs par 'dod do //
T09TD4154E:237a-32: 'bangs mos lag ba dag gis zlog cing /
T09TD4154E:237a-33: jo bo 'di lta bu nges par ma byed /
T09TD4154E:237a-34: zur phud can bden pa nyid du 'di ni bram ze zhig go //
T09TD4154E:237a-35: bi d'u sha ka'i rkang pa dag la gtugs nas jo bo khyod khro bar mi bya'o //
T09TD4154E:237a-36: 'brel pa la rjes su 'tsham pa'i kyal ka 'di ni nges par bdag gis byas so //
T09TD4154E:237b-0: bdag gis kyang @237b 'di dang bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:237b-1: rkang pa dag la gtugs na jo bo myos pa'i dbang du gyur pa bdag gis gnod pa gang byas pa dag bzod par mdzod cig / bdag kyang me tog sar pa can dang 'grogs nas /
T09TD4154E:237b-4: bdag gis bzod kyis song shig / bdag gis kyang dga' ba'i grogs po blta bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:237b-6: bi ta dag song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:237b-7: bi d'u sha kas bram ze bdag gi dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dag song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:237b-8: des na re zhig myos pa'i skye bos reg pas skyon can du byas pa dag rdzing bu 'dir khrus bya'o //
T09TD4154E:237b-10: phyi rol du mngon par phyogs nas 'di ni nges par dga' ba'i grogs pos dpal mo mchog gis gzugs las rgyal ba /
T09TD4154E:237b-11: ma la ya can ma bzung nas 'di nyid du 'ong ba dag go //
T09TD4154E:237b-12: des na re zhig de'i logs nyid du 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:237b-13: de nas ches mchog gis brgyan pa'i 'dren pa dang /
T09TD4154E:237b-14: ma la ya can ma dang /
T09TD4154E:237b-15: rnam par 'byor ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:237b-16: 'dren pas bltas na mig ni 'og tu ster zhing smras pa dag la kun du smra mi byed //
T09TD4154E:237b-17: mal stan dag la bzlog nas 'khod cing stobs kyis 'khyud pa dag la 'dar bar byed //
T09TD4154E:237b-18: grogs mo rnams ni phyir song tshe na gnas khang dag las 'thon pa nyid du 'dod //
T09TD4154E:237b-19: mi mthun nyid kyis di ring bag gsar dga' ma bdag gi shin tu dga' slad gyur //
T09TD4154E:237b-20: ma la ya can ma la blta zhing dga' ma ma la ya can ma //
T09TD4154E:237b-21: h'um zhes ster byed dag gis so so'i tshig la smra bcad sten pa gang yin dang //
T09TD4154E:237b-22: lus 'di zla 'od nags me 'bar ba lta bus gdungs par gyur pa gang yin dang //
T09TD4154E:237b-23: nyin mtshan shin tu mang bar yid gzhan med par bsams pa gang yin dka' thub de'i //
T09TD4154E:237b-24: 'bras bu gang dag da ltar dga' ma khyod kyi bzhin 'di lta ba 'di nyid do //
T09TD4154E:237b-25: 'dren mas bsgribs te bu mo gzugs bzang ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
T09TD4154E:237b-26: nges par snyan par smra ba yang shes pa zhig go //
T09TD4154E:237b-27: 'bangs mos bgad nas aa a'i mdza' bo'i phyogs su lhung ma 'di ni bden pa nyid de /
T09TD4154E:237b-28: 'di la snyan par smra ba ci zhig yod /
T09TD4154E:237b-30: grung mo skyed mos tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas kyi lam dag ston cig /'bangs mos jo bo tshur gshegs tshur gshegs /
T09TD4154E:237b-31: 'dren mas 'gro zhing 'dren ma la mtshon te /
T09TD4154E:238a-0: @238a * // khyod dal bud la bur shog cig / nu ma'i khur nyid khyod kyi rked pa ngal slad gyur na do shal gzhan gyis ci //
T09TD4154E:238a-1: byin pa zung ni tshang ra'i khur gyis gdung bar byed na dril chung 'dis kyang ci //
T09TD4154E:238a-2: rkang gnyis dag gis byin pa zung ni khur nus min na rkang gdub gal zhig / rang lus nyid kyis brgyan pa khyod ni nyon mongs slad du rgyan dag ci la 'dzin //
T09TD4154E:238a-3: 'bangs mos 'di ni skyed mos tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas te /
T09TD4154E:238a-4: jo bo zhugs shig / thams cad zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:238a-5: zhugs nas 'dren pas ae ma skyed mos tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas kyi dpal ni 'di nyid na'o //
T09TD4154E:238a-6: 'khri shing khang bzangs bkod pa byas mthar tsan dan dag las zags pa rnams kyis bsil bar byed //
T09TD4154E:238a-7: rgyun gyi khang pa dag dang nye bar mgrin sngon rnams kyi sgra ni gsal bar rjes su sgrogs //
T09TD4154E:238a-8: 'khrul 'khor gyis btang chu yi chogs ni me tog rdul dag babs par gyur pa'i tshogs pa rnams //
T09TD4154E:238a-9: rol par khyer bas ser ba 'di dag yal ga can gyi kyo ra 'gyengs shing mgyogs par 'bab //
T09TD4154E:238a-10: gzhan yang 'khri shing khang bzangs sa gzhi glu yi brtson pas mu cor du byed cing //
T09TD4154E:238a-11: me tog rdul gyis gsal bar dga' ston rtags dag gis ni reg gyur te //
T09TD4154E:238a-12: lhan cig spyod pa dang 'grogs sprang rtsi'i ro ni rdzogs par 'thung byed pa'i //
T09TD4154E:238a-13: bung ba 'di dag kun nas chang 'thung longs spyod nyams su myong byed bzhin //
T09TD4154E:238a-14: bi d'u sha kas skyes pa khyod rgyal bar gyur cig / bu mo khyod shis par gyur cig /'dren pas /
T09TD4154E:238a-15: grogs po de tsam gyi dus su gang du 'dug / bi d'u sha kas /
T09TD4154E:238a-16: bdag ni mgyogs pa nyid du 'ongs te /
T09TD4154E:238a-17: 'on kyang bag ma'i dga' ston la 'dus pa grub pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i chang 'thung rnams lta ba'i dge mtshan la 'di snyed kyi dus su bdag 'dug par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:238a-18: des na grogs po yang re zhig gzigs shig /'dren pas blta zhing ji ltar khyod brjod pa bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:238a-19: ha ri tsan dan gyis byugs lus can la yi me tog phreng ba rab tu 'dzin //
T09TD4154E:238a-20: nor bu'i rgyan gyi 'od dag reg pas dangs shing bkra bar byas pa'i gos dang ldan //
T09TD4154E:238a-21: grub pa'i skye bo dag dang lhan cig spel bar gyur pa'i rig 'dzin 'di dag rnams //
T09TD4154E:238a-22: tsan dan grib bsil dag la dga' ma'i 'thungs lhag tu gyur chang dag 'thung bar byed //
T09TD4154E:238b-0: des @238b na tshur sheg yu cag kyang shing ta ma la'i bsti gnas su 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:238b-3: 'di ni nges par shing ta ma la'i gnas so //
T09TD4154E:238b-4: bu mo khyod kyi bzhin 'di ni ston ka'i tshad pa dag gis yongs su nyams par byas pa bzhin mtshon to //
T09TD4154E:238b-5: des na shel gyi rdo'i gzhi 'di nyid la nye bar 'dug cig /'dren bas /
T09TD4154E:238b-6: grogs po yang dag par mtshon no //
T09TD4154E:238b-7: dga' ma'i gdong 'di 'gram pa dag / mdzes pas zla ba pham byas nas //
T09TD4154E:238b-8: gdung bas mngon par dmar ba'i mig / padmo dag las rgyal 'dod bzhin //
T09TD4154E:238b-9: ma la ya can ma'i lag pa bzung nas dga' ma 'dir 'dug cig thams cad 'khod do //
T09TD4154E:238b-11: 'dren ma'i gdong pa bteg nas blta zhing /
T09TD4154E:238b-12: bdag cag skyed mos tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas don med par lta ba'i dge mtshan can rnams kyis khyod yongs su ngal par byas te /
T09TD4154E:238b-14: smin ma'i 'khri shing rab mdzes shing //
T09TD4154E:238b-15: mchu yi yal 'dab dmar po can //
T09TD4154E:238b-16: bzhin 'di dga' ba'i skyed tshal te //
T09TD4154E:238b-17: 'di las gzhan pa nags 'ba' zhig /'bangs mos /
T09TD4154E:238b-18: 'dzum pa dang bcas par bi d'u sha ka la mtshon nas khyod kyis rje'i sras mo'i gdong ji ltar bsngags pa thos sam /
T09TD4154E:238b-19: bi d'u sha kas grung mo de lta bu'i khengs pa 'dzin par ma byed cig /'dzum pa dang bcas bar bdag cag gi nang na yang skye bo blta bar 'os pa ni yod pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:238b-20: phrag dog 'ba' zhig gis su yang bsngags par mi byad do //
T09TD4154E:238b-22: 'dzum pa dang bcas par jo bo khyod bdag gis bsngags par bgyi'o //
T09TD4154E:238b-24: dga' ba dang bcas par 'tsho ba dag tu byas so //
T09TD4154E:238b-25: bu mo khyod kyis gang gis na slar yang 'ga' zhig gis bdag la ji ltar khyod ni 'di ltar spre'u ser skya'o zhes mi brjod pa de ltar bka' drin mdzod cig /'bangs mos /
T09TD4154E:238b-26: bag ma la gnyid ma log par khyod di ring gnyid du 'gro zhing mig zum pa dang ldan pa mdzes bar bdag gis mthong ngo //
T09TD4154E:238b-27: des na de ltar nyid du 'dug cig / bi d'u sha kas /
T09TD4154E:238b-30: re zhig shing ta ma la'i yal 'dab kyi khu ba rams kyi khu ba'i rjes su mthun ba dag gis 'di'i bzhin nag por bya'o //
T09TD4154E:238b-31: langs nas yal 'dab blangs te 'tshir ba'i gar byed do //
T09TD4154E:238b-33: 'dri nams bi d'u sha ka mthong bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:239a-0: 'dren pas grogs po bdag cag rnams @239a * //
T09TD4154E:239a-1: gnas pa la khyod nyid kha bsgyur ba ni skal ba dang ldan pa'o //
T09TD4154E:239a-2: 'bangs mos shing ta ma la'i yal 'dab kyi thang chus bi d'u sha ka'i bzhin nag por byas so //
T09TD4154E:239a-3: 'dren mas 'dzum pa dang bcas pas bi d'u sha ka mthong nas 'dren pa la blta'o //
T09TD4154E:239a-6: khyod mchu'i yal 'dab dag la mthong //
T09TD4154E:239a-7: 'bras bu lta byed bdag gi ni //
T09TD4154E:239a-8: mig la smin no mig mdzes ma //
T09TD4154E:239a-10: bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig byas /
T09TD4154E:239a-11: 'bangs mos kye bsngags pa byas so //
T09TD4154E:239a-13: lag pas gdong la byugs te /
T09TD4154E:239a-14: lag pa la bltas nas khro ba dang bcas pas shing gi dbyug pa phyar te /
T09TD4154E:239a-15: 'bangs mo'i bu mo 'di rgyal po'i khab yin pas khyod la ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:239a-16: 'dren pa la mtshon nas kye khyod kyi mdun nyid du bdag 'bangs kyi bu mos sma phab bo //
T09TD4154E:239a-17: des na bdag 'dir 'dug ste ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:239a-20: 'bangs mos nges par jo bo bdag la khros pas /
T09TD4154E:239a-21: re zhig song la 'di dang bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:239a-22: 'dren mas bu mo grung mo bdag gcig bu dor nas khyod gang du 'gro /
T09TD4154E:239a-23: 'bangs mos 'dren ma la mtshon nas 'dzum pa dang bcas pas khyod gcig pu 'di lta bu nyid du yun ring du 'ong bar shog shig song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:239a-25: nyin byed zer gyi reg pas yongs su dmar ba'i mdzes pa 'dzin byed cing //
T09TD4154E:239a-26: rab 'phro so yi 'od zer rnams kyis ge sar dag ni gsal bar byas //
T09TD4154E:239a-27: aa yi mdzes ma khyod kyi bzhin 'di bden par padmo dang mtshungs te //
T09TD4154E:239a-28: 'on kyang 'di la sbrang rtsi byed pa 'thung zhing rnam par spyod pa med //
T09TD4154E:239a-29: 'dren mas bgad nas gdong dud par gyur te //
T09TD4154E:239a-32: 'phral la nye bar btud nas nges bar rgyal tshab bshes gnyen gyi dbyig 'di don gyis bzhin du gzhon nu lta ba la 'ongs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:239a-34: dga' ma khyed bdag nyid kyi khang par song shig / bdag kyang bshes gnyen gyi dbyig bltas nas myur du 'ong ba nyid do //
T09TD4154E:239a-35: 'dren ma 'bangs mo dang 'grogs te song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:239a-36: de nas bshes gnyen gyi dbyig rab tu zhugs so //
T09TD4154E:239a-37: nus dang ldan la de ma bcom //
T09TD4154E:239a-38: sprin gyi bzhon pa dag la ni //
T09TD4154E:239a-39: khyod kyi rgyal srid dgras khyer zhes //
T09TD4154E:239a-40: ngo tsha med bdag ji ltar gleng //
T09TD4154E:239b-0: @239b de lta mod kyi ma brjod par 'gro ba yang rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir brjod de 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:239b-2: 'dren pas mthong nas bshes gnyen gyi dbyig 'dir 'dug cig / bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis nye bar 'khod do //
T09TD4154E:239b-4: nges par brtags nas bshes gnyen gyi dbyig ni khros pa bzhin du mtshon no //
T09TD4154E:239b-5: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis bgad nas /
T09TD4154E:239b-6: ma tang ga nyams pa la nges par ci zhig khro /
T09TD4154E:239b-7: 'dren pas ma tang gas ci byas bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis rang nyams par bya ba'i slad du khyed kyi rgyal srid blangs so zhes grag go //
T09TD4154E:239b-8: 'dren bas dga' ba dang bcas shing bdag nyid kyis rtogs par nges par yang 'di ni bden ba zhig go //
T09TD4154E:239b-9: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis de gzhom par bya ba'i phyir bdag la gzhon nus bka' sgos shig / mang pos ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:239b-10: mtha' dag nam mkha' lam du byas te bgrod pa'i gzhal yas khang dag kun nas rab 'dud pas //
T09TD4154E:239b-11: dbyar bzhin nyi ma'i 'od zer sgrib cing nyin par dag ni nag po nyid du byed pa yi //
T09TD4154E:239b-12: grub pa 'di rnams khyod kyi gsung dag thob na 'di nas 'phral du g-yul la 'gro byed cing //
T09TD4154E:239b-13: 'phyar ba'i sgra brlag 'jigs bcas rgyal bo'i tshogs 'dud khyod kyi rgyal srid rang gir 'grub par 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:239b-14: yang na dpung gi tshogs kyis ci zhig bya //
T09TD4154E:239b-15: drag tu nges par phyung ba ral gri'i 'od zer tshogs kyis ni //
T09TD4154E:239b-16: ral pa'i tshogs kyis mdzes par gyur pa bdag nyid gcig pus kyang //
T09TD4154E:239b-17: rgyang nas mchongs pa'i seng ge dag gis glang po'i dbang po bzhin //
T09TD4154E:239b-18: nyams pa ma tang ga ni g-yul du 'joms pa nyid rig mdzod //
T09TD4154E:239b-20: bdag nyid kyis rtog par rna ba bsgribs nas aa ha ha mi bzad pa dag mngon par brjod do //
T09TD4154E:239b-21: yang na re zhig 'di skad ces gsal bar 'dzum pa dang bcas te bshes gnyen gyi dbyig de dag ci /
T09TD4154E:239b-22: dpung ba'i stobs dang ldan pa khyod la 'di las shin tu lhag pa dag kyang yod do //
T09TD4154E:239b-23: 'ong kyang gzhan gyi don du rang gi lus dag kyang //
T09TD4154E:239b-24: bslangs pa med par brtse bas sbyin pa gang //
T09TD4154E:239b-25: de ni rgyal srid ched du srog chags dag / gsod pa'i gdug pa ji ltar khas len byed //
T09TD4154E:239b-26: gzhan yang nyon mongs pa las gzhan pa dag la dgra'i blo bdag la yod pa ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:240a-0: des na khyod gal te bdag la dga' bar bya bar 'dod pa de lta na nyon mongs pas dbang du @240a * //
T09TD4154E:240a-1: byas pa'i gdung ba can 'di la rjes su brtse bar byos shig / bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis khro ba'i rgod pa dang bcas par ji ltar 'di bdag cag la phan par byed pa'am //
T09TD4154E:240a-2: phongs pa yin pas rjes su brtse ba ji ltar mi byed /
T09TD4154E:240a-3: 'dren pas bsgribs te gsar pa'i khro bas 'phangs ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'di re zhig bzlog par mi nus te /
T09TD4154E:240a-4: des na re zhig 'di skad ces /
T09TD4154E:240a-5: gsal bar bshes gnyen gyi dbyig longs shig / nang du 'jug par bya ste //
T09TD4154E:240a-6: de nyid du khyod la rtog par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:240a-7: nub kyi phyogs su bltas nas ji ltar nyin par yang yongs su gyur to //
T09TD4154E:240a-8: de ltar yang da ni bcom ldan 'od zer stong phrag can 'di /
T09TD4154E:240a-9: mtshan mo med par gnyid kyi rgya yis bcings pa'i gdung ba sel zhing padmo'i mdzod dag las //
T09TD4154E:240a-10: rab mchog rang gi zer gyis phyogs 'gengs bya ba gcig pus thams cad ma lus tshim byed pa //
T09TD4154E:240a-11: rgyun du bstod pa'i mu cor bzhi ldan grub pa rnams kyis bltas pa gang gi ngal dub ni //
T09TD4154E:240a-12: gzhan phan rgyu nyid du gyur nyi ma gcig pu 'di ni nub par gyur yang bsngags par 'os //
T09TD4154E:240a-13: thams cad song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:240a-16: // / de nas gos zung cig bzung ba'i nyug rum pa dang /
T09TD4154E:240a-17: sgo srungs kyang zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:240a-19: btsun mo'i 'khor du rnam gzhag bsgrubs gyur pa //
T09TD4154E:240a-20: dga' bas gzir ba bdag ni khrims lugs kyis //
T09TD4154E:240a-21: gnas dang gnas su 'gyel ba srung byed cing //
T09TD4154E:240a-22: spyod pa thams cad mi bdag rjes su mthun //
T09TD4154E:240a-23: sgo srungs kyis kye jo bo khyod gang du gshegs /
T09TD4154E:240a-25: lha mo bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gi yum gyis bdag la gsungs pa ;
T09TD4154E:240a-26: nyug rum pa khyod kyis ji srid zhag bcu'i bar du ma la ya can ma dang /
T09TD4154E:240a-27: mag pa la gos dmar po dag sbyin par bya'o zhes so //
T09TD4154E:240a-28: rgyal po'i bu mo yang gyos sgyug gi khab tu 'khod do //
T09TD4154E:240a-29: gzhon nu sprin gyi bzhon pa yang rgyal tshab bshes gnyen gyi dbyig dang 'grogs te rgya mtsho'i 'gram blta ru de ring song ngo zhes bdag gis thos so //
T09TD4154E:240a-30: des na re zhig rgyal po'i bu mo'i sngon du 'gro'am /
T09TD4154E:240a-31: mag pa'i sngon du 'gro bdag gis ma shes so //
T09TD4154E:240a-33: jo bo sngon la rgyal po'i bu mo'i sngon du song shig / de nyid du gal te na /
T09TD4154E:240a-34: dus 'di tsam du mag pa yang slar 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:240b-0: rab dga' legs pa @240b dag bstan to //
T09TD4154E:240b-3: bdag la yang rgyal po chen po kun gyi dbyig gis bka' stsal pa /
T09TD4154E:240b-4: ji ltar rab dga' song la bshes gnyen gyi dbyig la smros shig / tshes gcig gi sgron ma'i dga' ston 'di la ma la ya can ma dang /
T09TD4154E:240b-5: mag pa la yang 'ongs nas dga' ston de la 'os pa rnams cung zad nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes so //
T09TD4154E:240b-6: des jo bo rgyal po'i bu mo'i sngon du song shig //
T09TD4154E:240b-7: bdag kyang bshes gnyen dbyig bod pa'i slad du 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:240b-8: gnyi ga song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:240b-10: de nas sprin gyi bzhon pa dang /
T09TD4154E:240b-11: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:240b-12: 'dren pas mal stan rtsva 'jam dag dang gdan ni rdog tsang khang pa ljon pa dag gi 'og / btung ba chu rgyun bsil ba dag dang kha zas gtsang ba grogs ni ri dags te //
T09TD4154E:240b-13: de ltar ma bslangs 'byor pa thams cad rnyed pa'i nags tshal 'di na spyon cig ste //
T09TD4154E:240b-14: gang zhig slong ba rnyed dka' gzhan don bsgrub pa'i 'bras med don bral nyid du gnas pa'o //
T09TD4154E:240b-15: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis steng du bltas nas gzhon nu myur bar mdzod cig /'di ni chu'i phung po bskyod pa'i dus so //
T09TD4154E:240b-16: sprin gyi bzhon pas thos nas legs par mtshon no //
T09TD4154E:240b-18: rab sgrogs chu yi glang chen dbang po'i shugs kyis bsnun pas rjes 'brel rab rgyas shing //
T09TD4154E:240b-19: ri yi phug nang dag gis gzhi thams cad sgra snyan rab tu sgrogs byed pa //
T09TD4154E:240b-20: thos pa'i lam 'gog sgra 'di ji ltar drag tu sgrogs par byed pa de lta bar //
T09TD4154E:240b-21: rab 'phar grangs med dung dang ldan pa'i rlabs 'di dag ni nye bar 'ongs pa 'dra //
T09TD4154E:240b-23: gzhon nu byung ba nyid ma yin nam ltos shig / li shi'i yal 'dab dag ni zos gyur pa'i //
T09TD4154E:240b-24: lag ldan chu srin sgregs pa'i dri bzangs kyi //
T09TD4154E:240b-25: chu dang ldan ba rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs 'di //
T09TD4154E:240b-26: rin chen 'od zer dag gis spras te mdzes //
T09TD4154E:240b-28: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig / ston gyi dus kyi chu 'dzin ni //
T09TD4154E:240b-29: dkar ba'i sgrib byed kyis bsgribs pa /
T09TD4154E:240b-30: ma la ya yi rtse mo 'di //
T09TD4154E:240b-31: gangs can ri rtse'i dpal dag 'dzin //
T09TD4154E:240b-33: gzhon nu 'di dag ni rim la ya'i rtse mo ma yin te /
T09TD4154E:240b-34: nges par 'di dag ni klu rnams kyi rus ba'i tshogs so //
T09TD4154E:240b-36: mya ngan sdug bsngal dang bcas par rgyu mtshan ci'i phyir 'di snyed dus gcig tu shi bar gyur /
T09TD4154E:240b-38: gzhon nu 'di dag dus gcig tu shi ba nyid ma yin te /
T09TD4154E:241a-1: mnyan par mdzod cig / sngon rang gi gshog pa'i rlung gis rgya mtsho'i chu bskyod de sa 'og nas blangs nas bya khyung gis nyi ma so so la lag 'gro du ma za bar byed lo //
T09TD4154E:241a-2: sprin gyi bzhon bas sdug pa shin tu dka' ba dag byed do //
T09TD4154E:241a-3: de nas bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis de nas nam zhig gi tshe klu'i 'jig rten mtha' dag brlag tu dogs nas klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis bya khyung la smras pa /
T09TD4154E:241a-4: sprin gyi bzhon pas gus pa dang bcas par dang por nga zo shig ces pa 'am ci /
T09TD4154E:241a-5: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:241a-6: sprin gyi bzhon bas smad pa dang bcas par gzhan ci /
T09TD4154E:241a-7: bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis 'di brjod /
T09TD4154E:241a-8: khyod kyi mngon par 'debs pas skrag nas lag 'gro ma stong phrag rnams kyi mngal ltung bar byed cing phru gu rnams kyang lnga pa nyid du nye bar 'gro'o //
T09TD4154E:241a-9: de ltar bdag cag gi rgyun chad par gyur na khyod nyid kyi rang gi don nyams par byas par 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:241a-10: des na gang gi don du khyod sa 'og tu mngon par babs pa de'i don du nyi ma so sor rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa la re re nga nyid kyis bskul te gtang bar bya'o zhes so //
T09TD4154E:241a-11: sprin gyi bzhon pas sdug pa de ltar klu'i rgyal pos klu rnams legs par bsrungs lo //
T09TD4154E:241a-12: gang gi lce ni stong phrag gnyis nang na //
T09TD4154E:241a-13: gang gis sprul gcig bsrung phyir sbrul dgra la //
T09TD4154E:241a-14: ding bdag bdag nyid ster zhes smra ba yi //
T09TD4154E:241a-15: lce de de la gcig kyang med dam ci //
T09TD4154E:241a-17: de dag kyang bya'i rgyal pos khas blangs so //
T09TD4154E:241a-18: de ltar nyi ma so so re re rnam bzhag bsgrubs gyur pa'i //
T09TD4154E:241a-19: gang zhig sbrul bdag rnams ni 'dab chags rgyal pos za bar byed //
T09TD4154E:241a-20: de dag rnams kyi rus phung gangs ri dag gi 'od can 'di //
T09TD4154E:241a-21: nyi ma so sor 'phel bar gyur cing 'gyur la 'gyur ba yin //
T09TD4154E:241a-22: sprin gyi bzhon pas ngo mtshar dang bcas par //
T09TD4154E:241a-23: gtsang ba min pa kun gyi gter //
T09TD4154E:241a-24: byas pa mi gzo rnam par 'jig / lus ngan dag gi ched du yang //
T09TD4154E:241a-25: rmongs pa dag ni sdig par byed //
T09TD4154E:241a-26: kye ma klu rnams kyi rgud pa la 'di ni mthar thug pa med do //
T09TD4154E:241a-27: bdag nyid kyis rtogs par rang gi lus yongs su btang bas gdengs can cig tsam yang bdag gis yongs su srung bar byed nus par gyur na ci ma rung 'on kyang bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gnas so //
T09TD4154E:241a-28: de nas sgo skyong zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:241a-29: ri'i rtse mor ni bdag gis 'dzegs so //
T09TD4154E:241a-30: rnam par bltas nas bshes gnyen gyi dbyig 'di mag pa dang nye ba na 'khod do //
T09TD4154E:241b-0: re zhig drung du 'gro @241b bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:241b-2: gzhon nu rgyal bar gyur cig / bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis //
T09TD4154E:241b-3: rab dga' dgos pa ci'i slad du 'ongs /
T09TD4154E:241b-4: sgo srungs kyis rna bar shub par byed do //
T09TD4154E:241b-6: gzhon nu yab kyis bdag 'bod par byed do //
T09TD4154E:241b-9: gzhon nu yang gnod pa mang ba'i phyogs 'dir ltad mo la yun ring du gnas par mi bya'o //
