T09TD4154E:241b-10: sgo srungs dang 'grogs te song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:241b-12: re zhig bdag gis kyang ri'i rtse mo 'di las babs te rgya mtsho'i 'gram blta bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:241b-14: phyi rol na kyi hud bu sdug / kyi hud bu sdug / dung gi gtsug khyod gsod par byed zer na bdag gis ji ltar blta bar bya //
T09TD4154E:241b-15: sprin gyi bzhon pas aa ye bud med lta bu gzir ba'i cho nge dag go //
T09TD4154E:241b-16: des na re zhig nye bar btud de /
T09TD4154E:241b-18: 'di'i 'jigs pa gang las yin zhes gsal bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:241b-19: de nas rgan mo ngu zhing rjes su 'brang ba'i dung gi gtsug zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:241b-20: gos zung dag spras pa'i king ka ra yang ngo //
T09TD4154E:241b-21: rgan mos mchi ma dang bcas par kyi hud bu sdug dung gi gtsug / di ring khyod gsod par 'gyur ba bdag gis ji ltar blta bar bya /
T09TD4154E:241b-23: khyod kyi bzhin gyi zla ba 'di dang bral pas ni di ring bdag gi sa 'og mun par 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:241b-25: ma ma 'di ltar shin tu smre sngags 'don cing bdag rab tu gdung bar byed /
T09TD4154E:241b-26: rgan mos nges par brtags nas /
T09TD4154E:241b-28: kyi hud bu sdug khyod kyi lus nyi ma ma mthong bas shin tu gzhon pa 'di ji ltar na snying la brtse ba med pa'i mkha' lding gis nges par za bar 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:241b-29: mgrin pa nas bzung ste du bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:241b-30: dung gi gtsug gis yum smre sngags kyis ci zhig phan ltos shig / dang po gang tshe skyes pa na //
T09TD4154E:241b-31: mi rtag nyid kyi pang du byed //
T09TD4154E:241b-32: ma yis phyis nas ma mas bzhin //
T09TD4154E:241b-33: de tshe mya ngan rim pa ci //
T09TD4154E:241b-34: rgan mos bu sdug yud tsam zhig 'dug dang /
T09TD4154E:241b-35: re zhig khyod kyi bzhin blta bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:241b-36: king ka ras tshur shog tshur shog gzhon nu dung gi gtsug / de dag brjod pas khyod la ci /
T09TD4154E:241b-37: nges par bu la chags pas rmongs pa 'di dag gis ni rgyal po'i bya ba mi shes so //
T09TD4154E:241b-38: dung gi gtsug gis bzang po 'ong ba 'di nyid do //
T09TD4154E:242a-0: king ka ras bdag nyid kyis rtogs @242a * //
T09TD4154E:242a-1: par nges par bdag gis dung gi gtsug gsod pa'i rdo dang nye bar khrid zin to //
T09TD4154E:242a-2: re zhig gsod pa'i rtags 'di byin to gsod pa'i rdo dag bstan par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:242a-3: sprin gyi bzhon pas mthong nas /
T09TD4154E:242a-4: aa ye 'di ni bud med do //
T09TD4154E:242a-5: dung gi gtsug mthong nas nges par 'di ni 'di'i bu yin par brtag par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:242a-6: des na nges par ci'i don du du bar byed /
T09TD4154E:242a-8: nges par 'jigs pa'i rgyu ni ci yang ma mthong ngo //
T09TD4154E:242a-9: des na 'di'i 'jigs pa gang las 'byung bar 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:242a-10: ci zhig nye bar btud nas dri bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:242a-11: yang na 'di ni 'di ltar rgyun du cho nge 'don pas gal te 'di nyid las gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:242a-12: des na yal 'dab can gyis bsgribs te mnyan par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:242a-13: king kar ras mchi ma dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas gzhon nu dung gi gtsug 'di ni nges par jo bo'i bka' yin no zhes bya ste /
T09TD4154E:242a-15: dung gi gtsug gis bzang por smros shig / king ka ras klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis khyod la bka' stsal to //
T09TD4154E:242a-16: dung gi gtsug gis gus pa dang bcas par spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas rje yis ci zhig bka' stsal /
T09TD4154E:242a-17: king ka ras gos dmar po zung 'di dag gyon la gsod pa'i rdo la 'dzegs shig / gang gis gos dmar po'i rtags kyis nye bar mtshon pa dag mkha' lding gis bzung nas zas kyi don du 'khyer bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:242a-18: sprin gyi bzhon pas mchi ma dang bcas par 'di nyid sdug pa nor rgyas kyis yongs su btang ba zhig go //
T09TD4154E:242a-20: dung gi gtsug 'di long shig / gos zung dag gtod do //
T09TD4154E:242a-21: dung gi gtsug gis gus pa dang bcas par blangs te /
T09TD4154E:242a-22: mgo la bzung nas rje la gus par byed do //
T09TD4154E:242a-23: rgan mos bu'i lag na gos dag 'dug pa mthong nas brang brdung ba dang bcas par kyi hud mnyes gshin gang gis 'jigs pa rdo rje lhung ba ni 'di nyid do //
T09TD4154E:242a-25: king ka ras nges par mkha' lding 'ong ba'i dus la nye bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:242a-26: des na myur du 'bros par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:242a-27: king ka ra song par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:242a-28: dung gi gtsug gis yum dbugs phyin par gyur cig / rgan mo dbugs phyung ste mchi ma dang bcas par kyi hud kyi hud bu sdug yid la re ba brgya yis thob ba bo //
T09TD4154E:242a-29: khyod phyis bdag gis gang du mthong bar 'gyur /
T09TD4154E:242b-0: sprin gyi bzhon pas @242b mchi ma dang bcas par kun du rmongs shing yang yang mchi ma'i rgyun gtong smre sngags mang du brjod byas nas //
T09TD4154E:242b-1: bdag gi bu sdug skyob pa su zhes phyogs rnams dag tu phongs pas mig 'phen ma'i //
T09TD4154E:242b-2: ma yi phang na nye bar bsten pa'i bu 'di brtse ba dor nas za byed pa //
T09TD4154E:242b-3: bya yi bdag po'i mchu nyid ma yin snying yang rdo rje dag las byas sam snyam //
T09TD4154E:242b-4: dung gi gtsug gis bdag nyid kyi lag pas ma'i gdong yongs su 'phyi zhing yum shin tu 'khrugs pas ci zhig phan dbugs phyung shig / rgan mos mchi ma dang bcas par ji ltar dbugs phyin par 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:242b-5: ci bdag ni pu gcig pa can no zhes bya ste brtse ba dang bcas par klu'i rgyal pos ma bsams so //
T09TD4154E:242b-6: kyi hud brtse med mthar byed da lta brtse ba med pa'i snying can khyod kyis 'di ltar rgyas shing gson pa'i 'jig rten na bdag gi bu sdug gcig pu dran no //
T09TD4154E:242b-7: rnam pa thams cad du skal ba zhan pa bdag bcom par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:242b-10: gzir zhing mgrin par srog phyin te //
T09TD4154E:242b-11: rang gi gnyen gyis yongs btang ba //
T09TD4154E:242b-12: 'di ni gal te ma bsrungs na //
T09TD4154E:242b-13: bdag gi lus kyi yon tan ci //
T09TD4154E:242b-14: des na re zhig nye bar 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:242b-15: dung gi gtsug gis yum bdag nyid brtan par mdzod cig / rgan mos kyi hud bu sdug rnyed dka' ba rnyed pa dung gi gtsug / gal te re zhig klu'i 'jig rten yongs su srung bar byed pa nor rgyas kyis khyod yongs su btang ba de la su zhig gis khyod yongs su skyob bar 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:242b-16: sprin gyi bzhon pas 'phral la nye bar btud de kye bdag go //
T09TD4154E:242b-17: rgan mos 'jigs pa dang bcas par stod g-yogs kyis bu g-yogs nas sprin gyi bzhon pa la nye bar btud de /
T09TD4154E:242b-18: bi na ta'i bu bdag la 'tshe ba gyis shig / bdag ni khyod kyi zas kyi rgyur yongs su brtags pa'o //
T09TD4154E:242b-21: ae ma'o pu la byams pa'o //
T09TD4154E:242b-22: 'di yi bu la byams pa yis //
T09TD4154E:242b-24: snying la brtse med lag 'gro yi //
T09TD4154E:242b-25: dgra yang brtse ba byed dam snyam //
T09TD4154E:242b-26: dung gi gtsug gis yum skrag pas ci zhig phan /
T09TD4154E:242b-27: 'di ni nges par klu'i dgra ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:242b-28: ltos shig / klu chen mgo bo bskam zhing khrag gzags pa'i //
T09TD4154E:242b-29: zer mas byugs pa gtum po'i mchu dang ldan //
T09TD4154E:242b-30: gang na mkha' lding dag ste gang na yang //
T09TD4154E:243a-2: rgan mos bu sdug bdag ni khyod gsod pas 'jigs te thams cad mkha' lding nyid du mthong ngo //
T09TD4154E:243a-4: kye yum ma 'jigs shig / bdag ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i gzhon nu ste /
T09TD4154E:243a-5: khyod kyi bu bsrung ba nyid kyi don du 'ongs pa yin no //
T09TD4154E:243a-6: rgan mos dga' ba dang bcas par bu slar yang de brjod cig / sprin gyi bzhon pas /
T09TD4154E:243a-7: yum yang dang yang du brjod pa 'di yis ci /
T09TD4154E:243a-8: las nyid kyis rdzogs par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:243a-9: rgan mos spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas bdag gi bu sdug yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig / sprin gyi bzhon pas /
T09TD4154E:243a-10: yum gcig gsod rtags 'di ni bdag la gsol //
T09TD4154E:243a-11: rang lus g-yogs te khyod kyi bu yi ni //
T09TD4154E:243a-12: srog dag bsrung phyir bi na ta skyes kyi //
T09TD4154E:243a-13: kha zas dag la bdag gis stsal bar bgyi'o //
T09TD4154E:243a-14: rgan mos rna ba bsgribs te tshig de zhi bar gyur cig / khyod kyang dung gi gtsug dang /
T09TD4154E:243a-15: khyad par med par bdag gi bu nyid do //
T09TD4154E:243a-16: yang na dung gi gtsug pas kyang khyod shin tu lhag pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:243a-17: gang zhig gnyen gyi skye bos kyang yongs su btang ba bdag gi bu lus sbyin pas kyang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T09TD4154E:243a-18: dung gi gtsug gis ya mtshan dang bcas par ae ma ho sems can chen po 'di'i spyod pa ni 'gro ba dag las bzlog pa zhig ste /
T09TD4154E:243a-20: gang gi slang du kun gyi bshes kyi gtum po bzhin du sngon tshe khyi sha zos gyur cing //
T09TD4154E:243a-21: gang gi ched du goo ta ma yis de la phan byas t'a la'i byin pa rab tu bsad //
T09TD4154E:243a-22: gang gi don du mkha' lding 'od srung bu 'dis nyi ma so sor lto 'phye 'joms byed pa //
T09TD4154E:243a-23: srog de nyid ni rtsva bzhin gang zhig brtse bas gzhan gyi don du ster bar byed pa mtshar //
T09TD4154E:243a-24: sprin gyi bzhon pa la mchon [*mtshon] nas kye bdag nyid chen po khyod kyis bdag nyid rab tu rtsom pa'i zol med pa'i brtse ba dang ldan pa dag bdag la bstan to //
T09TD4154E:243a-25: des na 'bad pa 'di yis ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:243a-26: ltos shig / bdag lta srog chags phra mo rnams //
T09TD4154E:243a-28: gzhan gyi don la nus ldan pa //
T09TD4154E:243a-29: khyod 'dra 'byung ba ga la zhig / des na 'dis ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:243a-30: zhen pa 'di thong shig / sprin gyi bzhon pas dung gi gtsug gi lag nas bzung ste /
T09TD4154E:243a-31: gzhon nu dang gi gtsug bdag gis gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pas yid la re ba'i skabs yun ring po nas rnyed bdag gi bar chad bya bar mi 'os so //
T09TD4154E:243b-0: rnam par @243b rtog pa med par gsod pa'i rtags dag byin cig / dung gi gtsug gis sems dpa' chen po don med pa'i gdung ba chen po 'dis ci zhig bya //
T09TD4154E:243b-1: dung gi gtsug gis dung skyong gi rigs dung ltar dkar ba dri ma can du byed dam ci //
T09TD4154E:243b-2: ci ste khyod bdag la rjes su brtse bar byed pa de lta na bdag cag gi yum 'di ji ltar 'tsho ba stong par mi 'gyur bde lta bu'i thabs bsam par mdzod cig / sprin gyi bzhon pas kye thabs bsams pa nyid ma yin nam /
T09TD4154E:243b-4: de ni khyod nyid kyi dbang du gyur to //
T09TD4154E:243b-5: dung gi gcug gis ji ltar sprin gyi bzhon pas gang zhig khyod ni shi gyur na //
T09TD4154E:243b-7: de ni gal te gson 'dod na //
T09TD4154E:243b-8: bdag gi srog gis bdag nyid srungs //
T09TD4154E:243b-10: des na bdag la gsod pa'i mtshan ma myur du gsol cig /'dis bdag nyid g-yogs te gsod pa'i rdo la 'dzegs par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:243b-11: khyod kyang ma'i mdun du brdar te gnas 'di nas ldog par byos shig / gal te na gsod pa'i gnas nye bar gyur pa 'di mthong nas bud med rang bzhin gyis sdar ma'i ngang can srog btang bar srid do //
T09TD4154E:243b-12: bsad pa'i klu rnams kyis keng rus kyis dkrigs pa'i dur khrod chen po khyod kyis ma mthong ngam ci //
T09TD4154E:243b-13: de ltar yang g-yo ba'i mchu yis drangs shing phyed lhung sha yi cha ni zos pas 'dod pa 'phel gyur pa'i //
T09TD4154E:243b-14: bya rgod rnams kyi gshog pa gnyis ni skyod par byed pas mun pa stug po nyid byas shing //
T09TD4154E:243b-15: khrag gi rgyun 'bebs mang po'i zhag ni rgyun du zag cing rul pa'i dring ldang ba 'dir //
T09TD4154E:243b-16: ce spyang rnams kyi kha nas rab 'bar me yi phreng ba ltung zhing lhab ces sgrogs par byed //
T09TD4154E:243b-17: dung gi gtsug gis ji ltar bdag gis ma mthong sprul gyi zas kyis nyi ma so sor ni //
T09TD4154E:243b-18: mi stong bya ba'i 'dren pas dga' byas pa //
T09TD4154E:243b-19: ri bong can dkar rus pa thod pa can //
T09TD4154E:243b-20: dur khrod 'di ni drag po'i lus bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:243b-21: des na song zhig skrag par nye bar bkod pa 'di dag gis ci zhig bya //
T09TD4154E:243b-22: nges par mkha' lding 'ong ba'i dus ni nye bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:243b-23: ma'i mdun du pus mo btsugs nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba bkod de /
T09TD4154E:243b-24: da ni yum khyod kyang log cig / yum gcig gang dang gang du bdag / rab tu skye ba nyid 'gyur ba //
T09TD4154E:243b-25: de dang der ni bu la byams //
T09TD4154E:243b-26: khyod nyid bdag gi mar gyur cig / rkang pa la gtugs so //
T09TD4154E:244a-0: rgan mos mchi ma dang bcas pas kyi hud ji @244a * //
T09TD4154E:244a-1: ltar khyod kyi tshig ni mchi ma med pa'o //
T09TD4154E:244a-2: nges par bu sdug khyod btang nas gzhan du bdag gi rkang pa mi 'dor ro //
T09TD4154E:244a-3: des na khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:244a-4: dung gi gtsug gis longs nas re zhig bdag gis kyang shin tu mi ring ba na legs ldan lho phyogs go karna yod pa la bskor ba byas te /
T09TD4154E:244a-5: rje'i bka' la gnas par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:244a-8: kye ma mngon par 'dod pa grub par ma gyur to //
T09TD4154E:244a-9: des na 'di la thabs ci zhig yod 'phral la nyug rum par zhugs par gyur te gos zung 'di sprin gyi bzhon pas mthong nas dga' ba dang bcas shing bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa ae ma ma brtags par rnyed pa'i gos dmar po zung cig po 'dis bdag gi mngon par 'dod par grub par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:244a-11: gos zung cig po 'di ni lha mo bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gi yum gyis gzhon nu la bskur ba yin no //
T09TD4154E:244a-12: des na gzhon nus 'di yongs su bzhes shig / sprin gyi bzhon pas langs nas blangs te bdag nyid kyis rtogs par bdag gi ma la ya can ma'i lag pa bzung ba ni 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:244a-13: gyon nas gsal bar kye nyug rum pa gshegs shig khyod kyis bdag tshig gis lha mo la phyag 'tshal bar bya ste /
T09TD4154E:244a-14: ji ltar yun ring du thogs pa'i sprin gyi bzhon pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:244a-16: ji ltar gzhon nus bka' stsal pa bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:244a-17: song ngo sprin gyi bzhon pas /
T09TD4154E:244a-18: gzhan gyi don du lus gtong ba'i //
T09TD4154E:244a-19: dus la bab che byung gyur pa //
T09TD4154E:244a-20: gos ni dmar po zung 'di dag / dga' ba shin tu chen po byed //
T09TD4154E:244a-21: rnam par bltas nas ji ltar rim la ya'i rdo'i tshogs g-yo ba dang rlung drag tu ldang bde ltar bya'i rgyal po nye bar gyur to zhes bdag rtog go //
T09TD4154E:244a-22: gzhan yang 'jig pa'i sprin dang mtshungs pa gshog rtsa'i phreng ba dag gis nam mkha' rab tu sgrib byed cing //
T09TD4154E:244a-23: shugs kyi rlung gis bskyod pa'i rgya mtshos sa gzhi 'gengs pa bzhin du chu dag ngogs su 'phen //
T09TD4154E:244a-24: phyogs kyi gnyis 'thung dbang po rnams kyi dus mthar dogs pa byed cing 'jigs bcas bltas gyur te //
T09TD4154E:244a-25: bcu gnyis nyi ma ltar 'bar lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rab tu ser skyar byed //
T09TD4154E:244a-26: des na ji srid dung gi gtsug 'di 'ongs par ma gyur pa de srid du gsod pa'i rdo 'di la myur bar bdag 'dzeg par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:244a-28: 'dug ste reg pa'i gar byed cing //
T09TD4154E:244b-1: ji ltar mngon par 'dod don grub pa'i slad //
T09TD4154E:244b-2: gsod pa'i rdo 'di la sbyar de ltar ni //
T09TD4154E:244b-3: ma la ya yi tsan dan ros brlan pa'i //
T09TD4154E:244b-4: ma la ya can mas kyang bde mi byed //
T09TD4154E:244b-5: yang na mal ya can ma ci zhig / ma yi pang du byis pa ni //
T09TD4154E:244b-6: bde bar nyal bas gang thob pa'i //
T09TD4154E:244b-7: bde de bdag gis gsod pa yi //
T09TD4154E:244b-8: rdo 'di yi ni steng du thob //
T09TD4154E:244b-10: re zhig bdag nyid bsgribs te 'dug par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:244b-12: de nas mkha' lding zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:244b-13: lhag ma can gzugs 'jigs pas zlum por byas pa dran zhing bsil zer can gyi dkyil 'khor 'phangs //
T09TD4154E:244b-14: shing rta'i rta ni skrag nas nyi ma bskyod tshe sngon la skyes pas kun dga' ldan par mthong //
T09TD4154E:244b-15: mtha' nas chu 'dzin tshogs pa dag ni nges par 'bab pas gshog pa ring po nyid gyur pa //
T09TD4154E:244b-16: sbrul zas la dga' bdag ni mgyogs pas skad cig nyid la ri bo ma la yar phyin to //
T09TD4154E:244b-17: sprin gyi bzhon pas smon lam byed do //
T09TD4154E:244b-18: klu ni srung byed bdag gi bsod nams gang //
T09TD4154E:244b-19: rang lus sbyin las de ring gang bsgrubs pa //
T09TD4154E:244b-20: de yis bdag nyid srid pa srid par ni //
T09TD4154E:244b-21: gzhan phan snying por ldan pa'i lus thob shog / mkha'i lding gis sprin gyi bzhon pa la nges par brtags nas //
T09TD4154E:244b-22: lhag ma'i klu rnams bsrung phyir gsod pa'i rdo 'di dag la nges par lhung gyur pa'i //
T09TD4154E:244b-23: snying kha la ni rdo rje'i dbyug pa rab drag mchu yis rab tu bcom byas nas /
T09TD4154E:244b-26: // / bdag la 'jigs pas snying dag dral zhing zag pa'i khrag gis rab tu byugs pa bzhin //
T09TD4154E:244b-27: gos dmar gyis g-yogs gdengs can dag ni bza' bar bya phyir myur bar blang bar bya //
T09TD4154E:244b-28: mngon par btab ste blangs so //
T09TD4154E:244b-29: mtha' nas me tog ltung bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:244b-30: mkha' lding gis ya mtshan dang bcas par aa ye steng nas me /
T09TD4154E:244b-31: tog gi char pa dang rnga bo che'i sgra 'di dag kyang mthong zhing thos nas //
T09TD4154E:244b-32: bung ba kun du dga' bar byed pa'i dri ldang me tog char 'di mkha' las ci phyir 'bab //
T09TD4154E:244b-33: mtho ris phyogs kyi 'khor lo rnga chen rnams kyi sgra 'dis mu cor dag tu ci slad byed //
T09TD4154E:244b-35: bdag gi shugs kyi rlung gis yongs 'du dag ni bskyod pa dang //
T09TD4154E:244b-36: 'jigs pa'i sprin gyi tshogs rnams dus mthar dogs pa skyes te 'di yang bsgrags pa yin nam snyam //
T09TD4154E:244b-37: sprin gyi bzhon pas ae ma bdag gi don byas par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:244b-38: mkha' lding gis rtog cing klu rnams srung bar byed pa 'di //
T09TD4154E:244b-39: ji ltar bdag la lji bar snang //
T09TD4154E:244b-40: de ltar sbrul dag za 'dod pa //
T09TD4154E:244b-41: gsal bar di ring sel bar 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:245a-1: na re zhig ri ma la ya'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ji ltar 'dod par 'di bza' bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:245a-2: khyer nas song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:245a-5: // / de nas sgo srungs rab dga' zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:245a-6: mdza' bos rang khyim skyed tshal gnas la yang //
T09TD4154E:245a-7: mdza' bdag la sdig pa dogs 'gyur na //
T09TD4154E:245a-8: gnod mang mthong zhing 'jigs su rung ba yi //
T09TD4154E:245a-9: 'brog dgon dbus na gnas la smos ci dgos //
T09TD4154E:245a-10: de ltar yang sprin gyi bzhon pa rgya mtsho'i rlabs lta ba'i ltad mo la song pa ni yun ring du thogs so zhes rgyal po chen po kun gyi dbyig sdug bsngal dang ldan par gnas so //
T09TD4154E:245a-11: de yis bdag la dka' bsgos pa rab dga' bdag gi mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang nye ba'i phyogs su mag pa sprin gyi bzhon pa song par gyur to zhes thos so //
T09TD4154E:245a-13: des na myur bar song la ci 'di rang gi khyim du 'ongs sam /
T09TD4154E:245a-14: ma 'ongs shes par gyis shig ces so //
T09TD4154E:245a-15: re zhig de nyid du 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:245a-16: song ba dang mdun du mthong nas /
T09TD4154E:245a-17: aa ye 'di ni rgyal po'i drang srong sprin gyi bzhon pa'i yab sprin gyi tog bsti gnas kyi khyams na yum chos spyod ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i bu mos rim gro byed cing 'khod do //
T09TD4154E:245a-18: de ltar yang rab dkar 'khyog po g-yo zhing bskyod pa lbu ba ldan pa'i chu dang mtshungs pa 'dzin //
T09TD4154E:245a-19: na tshod mtshungs shing bsod nams che ldan lha mos rnam mdzes dzahnu'i bu mo bzhin //
T09TD4154E:245a-20: ji ltar rlabs kyis mdzes bzhin gang gi drung na ma la ya can nye bar gnas //
T09TD4154E:245a-21: sprin gyi tog 'di nyid ni chu gter dag dang rab tu mtshungs pa'i dpal 'di 'dzin //
T09TD4154E:245a-22: des na re zhig nye bar 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:245a-23: de nas sprin gyi tog gdan la gnas shing btsun mo dang mna' ma dang bcas pa zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:245a-24: lang tsho dag gi bde ba spyad cing grags pa rgyas par byas //
T09TD4154E:245a-25: brtan pa'i blo yis rgyal srid la 'dug dka' thub rnam par spyad //
T09TD4154E:245a-26: bu 'di bsngags 'os mna' ma 'di ni rigs mtshungs legs las skyes //
T09TD4154E:245a-27: ka ye don byas bdag gi di ring 'chi ba bsam par byas //
T09TD4154E:245a-28: rab dags 'phral la nye bar btud nas sprin gyi bzhon pa'i sprin gyi tog gis rna ba bsgribs nas sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig / yum gyis nges par bkra mi shes pa 'di nyams par gyur cig / ma la ya can mas bdag nyid kyis rtogs par mtshan ma ngan pa 'dis bdag gi snying 'dar ba bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:245a-29: sprin gyi tog gis bzang po sprin gyi bzhon pa ci /
T09TD4154E:245b-0: rab dags sprin gyi bzhon pa'i lam lta ba la rgyal po chen @245b po kun gyi dbyig gis khyod kyi drung du bdag btang ngo //
T09TD4154E:245b-1: des na rgyal po chen po bdag la bka' stsol cig / bdag gis rje la ji skad ces rtogs par bgyi //
T09TD4154E:245b-3: ci bu de nyid na nye bar mi gnas sam rab dags ma mchis so //
T09TD4154E:245b-4: yum gyis mya ngan dang bcas par rgyal po chen po de yang med na da ni bdag gi bu gang du song ;
T09TD4154E:245b-5: / gang gis na de ltar yun ring du thogs /
T09TD4154E:245b-6: sprin gyi tog gis nges par bdag cag gi srog bsrung ba'i don du ring du song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:245b-7: ma la ya can mas mya ngan dang bcas shing bdag nyid kyis rtogs par bdag gis kyang rje'i sras yud tsam zhig kyang ma mthong bas gzhan nyid 'ga' zhig dogs so //
T09TD4154E:245b-8: rab dags rgyal po chen po bka' stsol cig / bdag gis rje la ji skad gsol pa bgyi /
T09TD4154E:245b-9: sprin gyi tog gis mig g-yon pa 'gul bas gsal bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:245b-10: sprin gyi bzhon pa yun ring du thogs so zhes bdag 'khrugs shing sems par byed pa na mi 'dod bsal bar bya ba'i phyir //
T09TD4154E:245b-11: yang yang g-yas pa min pa'i mig / ci zhig la g-yo mig ngan khyod //
T09TD4154E:245b-12: g-yob nyi mas sel gyur cig / steng du lta zhing /
T09TD4154E:245b-13: bcom ldan 'od stong pa 'di ni srid pa gsum gyi mig gcig pu ste /
T09TD4154E:245b-14: sprin gyi bzhon pa dge legs dag gsal bar ston cig / ya mtshan dang bcas par /
T09TD4154E:245b-15: bltas par gyur na mig la sdug bsngal rab tu ster //
T09TD4154E:245b-16: khrag gi zer ma dang mtshungs 'od zer gsal bo 'gyed //
T09TD4154E:245b-17: ltas ngan rlung gis bskyod byas skar ma dang mtshungs 'di //
T09TD4154E:245b-18: glo bur nyid du mkha' las ci slad mdun du 'bab //
T09TD4154E:245b-19: ji ltar bdag gi rkang pa nyid la 'bab //
T09TD4154E:245b-20: thams cad kyis nges par brtags so //
T09TD4154E:245b-21: sprin gyi tog gis aa ye sha rlon pa dang skra dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi nor bu 'di su zhig gi yin par 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:245b-22: yum gyis mya ngan dang bcas par gtsug gi rin po che 'di ni bdag gi bu'i yin pa 'dra'o //
T09TD4154E:245b-25: rab dags rgyal po chen po de ltar ma rtogs par gdung bar ma byed cig /'dir ni klu mkha' lding gis zos pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu sder mo dang khas bcom pa du ma dag ltung ba nyid do //
T09TD4154E:245b-27: lha mo rab dags rig pa dag brjod do //
T09TD4154E:245b-28: gal te de ltar yang yin pa srid do //
T09TD4154E:245b-29: yum gyi sa rab dags gal te na dus 'di tsam gyis gyos sgyug gi khab nyid du bdag gi bu 'ongs pa srid do //
T09TD4154E:246a-0: des na song la rtogs te myur du @246a * //
T09TD4154E:246a-1: 'phrin srings shig / rab dags ji ltar lha mos gsungs pa bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:246a-4: lha mo klu dag gi gtsug gi nor bu yin pa yang srid do //
T09TD4154E:246a-5: de nas dung gi gtsug gos dmar po dag bzung sta zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:246a-6: mchi ma dang bcas par brlag go //
T09TD4154E:246a-8: myur bar rgya mtsho'i 'gram du go karna la btud byas nas //
T09TD4154E:246a-9: lto 'phye chen po gsod pa'i sa gzhi der ni bdag phyin na //
T09TD4154E:246a-10: rig pa 'dzin pa kha dang sder mos snying kha bcom pa de //
T09TD4154E:246a-11: khyer nas mkha' lding dag ni mkha' la rab tu song bar gyur //
T09TD4154E:246a-12: kyi hud rgyu med pa'i gnyen gcig po //
T09TD4154E:246a-13: kyi hud mchog gi snying rje can gyi hud gzhan gyi sdug bsngal ba can /
T09TD4154E:246a-14: kye khyod ni gang du gshegs bdag gi tshig gi lan byin cig / nyams pa dung gi gtsug mngal na gnas pa nyid na ci'i phyir ma shi khyod kyis ci zhig byas //
T09TD4154E:246a-15: klu rnams bskyabs las grags ba cig ma thob //
T09TD4154E:246a-16: bsngags par 'os pa'i rje yi gsung ma bsgrubs //
T09TD4154E:246a-17: gzhan gyis bdag nyid btang bsrungs mya ngan 'os //
T09TD4154E:246a-18: kye ma kyi hud smad bdag bslus so bslus //
T09TD4154E:246a-19: des na rnam pa 'di ltar gyur pa bdag ni skad cig tsam 'tsho zhing bdag nyid la nye bar bgad par mi bya'o //
T09TD4154E:246a-20: re zhig 'di'i rjes su song ste brtag par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:246a-21: yongs su 'gro zhing sa la bltas te /
T09TD4154E:246a-22: dang por sa gzhi khyab byas de nas mdun du thigs pa rags pa grol ba dag tu lhung //
T09TD4154E:246a-23: rdo rnams la lhung brdabs shing 'thor gyur thigs phran ldan pa'i thang la srog chags rnams kyis dkrigs /
T09TD4154E:246a-24: khams kyi ngos la mtshon dka' bzhin stug dag gi rtse dang phug rnams ngag la chags gyur pa //
T09TD4154E:246a-25: khrag gi rgyun 'di'i rjes su legs par 'brangs te mkha' lding lta 'dod bdag ni 'gro bar bya //
T09TD4154E:246a-26: yum gyis thos nas skrag pa dang bcas par /
T09TD4154E:246a-27: rgyal po chen po su zhig du ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa 'di ni 'di nyid du myur bar 'ong zhing bdag gi snying 'khrugs par byed des na re zhig 'di su yin shes par byos shig / sprin gyi tog gis /
T09TD4154E:246a-28: ji ltar lha mo smra ba bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:246a-29: dung gi gtsug gis kyi hud 'jig rten gsum gyi gtsug gi nor bu gcig pu khyod bdag gi gang du blta bar bya /
T09TD4154E:246a-31: sprin gyi tog gis thos nas dga' ba dang bcas par bgad nas lha mo mya ngan thong shig /'di'i gtsug gi nor bu 'di sha la chags pa'i bya 'ga' zhig gis mgo las bcad de khyer ba lhung ba yin nam snyam mo //
T09TD4154E:246b-0: yum gyis tshim pa dang bcas par ma la ya can ma la 'khyud nas aa a'i yugs sa mor ma gyur ma brten par mdzod cig / khyod ni rnam pa 'di 'dra bdag gis @246b nges par yugs sa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:246b-1: ma la ya can mas dga' ba dang bcas par yum khyod kyi shis par brjod pa yis so zhes te zhabs la gtugs so //
T09TD4154E:246b-2: sprin gyi tog gi dung gi gtsug la nye bar btud nas bu khyod kyi gtsug gi nor bu stor ram ci /
T09TD4154E:246b-3: dung gi gtsug gis rje bdag gcig pu'i ma yin gyi //
T09TD4154E:246b-5: sprin gyi tog gi bu ji ltar na dung gi gtsug gi sdug bsngal gyi khur chen po dang ldan pas mchi mas mgrin pa nye bar bsgags pa bdag gis brjod par mi nus so //
T09TD4154E:246b-6: sprin gyi tog gis rang gi mya ngan shin tu bzod par dka' ba dag bdag la smos shig / de bdag la 'phos pa gang gis na khyod kyis bzod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:246b-7: dung gi gtsug gis gsan par mdzod cig /
T09TD4154E:246b-8: nges par bdag ni klu rung gi gtsug ces bya ba'o //
T09TD4154E:246b-9: zas kyi res la bab nas klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis bi na ta'i bu la bsrings so //
T09TD4154E:246b-11: gal te khrag gi rgyun gyi lam 'di rdul gyis bsgribs te mtshan dka' bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:246b-12: des na mdor bsdus pa bshad par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:246b-13: sems ni snying rje dang ldan pa //
T09TD4154E:246b-14: rig pa 'dzin pa su zhig gis //
T09TD4154E:246b-15: rang nyid mkha' lding la byin nas //
T09TD4154E:246b-16: bdag gis srog ni bsrungs par gyur //
T09TD4154E:246b-18: mnyes gshin gzhan la phan pa la zhen pa de lta bu bdag gi bu las gzhan pa su zhig yod /
T09TD4154E:246b-19: kye bu sprin gyi bzhon pa yis zhes gsal bar brjod cig / kyi hud skal ba ngan pa bdag bcom mo //
T09TD4154E:246b-20: yum gyis kyi hud bu sdug pa khyod kyis 'di ci la byas /
T09TD4154E:246b-22: kyi hud ji ltar bdag la mtshan ma ngan pa ni bden pa nyid du gyur to //
T09TD4154E:246b-24: dung gi gtsug gis mchi ma dang bcas par aa ye nges par sems dpa' chen po de'i yab yum ni 'di dag go //
T09TD4154E:246b-25: bdag gi mi 'dod pa brjod nas 'di dag gnas skabs 'di la bkod do //
T09TD4154E:246b-26: yang na dug 'dzin gyi kha nas dug las gzhan pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur /
T09TD4154E:246b-27: kye ma srog rab tu ster ba sprin gyi bzhon pa la de dang mtshungs pa'i phan pa dung gi gtsug gis byas so //
T09TD4154E:246b-28: des na da lta nyid du bdag nyid kyis gsad par bya 'am ci /
T09TD4154E:246b-29: yang na re zhig 'di dag dbugs dbyung bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:246b-30: yab dbugs phyin par mdzod cing //
T09TD4154E:246b-31: yum dbugs phyin par mdzod cig / gnyi ga dbugs phyin par gyur to /
T09TD4154E:246b-32: yum gyis bu mo longs shig / rings par ma byed cig / bdag cag kyang sprin gyi bzhon pa med par 'tsho 'am ci /
T09TD4154E:247a-0: des na gre zhig dbugs phyin par gyis shig / mal ya can mas @247a * //
T09TD4154E:247a-1: dbugs phyin nas kyi hud rje'i sras khyod gang du bdag gis blta bar bya //
T09TD4154E:247a-3: kyi hud bu bla ma'i zhabs kyi bsnyen bkur gyi cho ga shes pa khyod bdag gis gang du blta bar bya /
T09TD4154E:247a-4: khyod kyis bdag gi rkang pa la //
T09TD4154E:247a-5: gtsug gi nor bu gtug tu bcug /'jig rten gzhan du 'gro na yang //
T09TD4154E:247a-6: dul ba'i rim pa mdor ro //
T09TD4154E:247a-7: gtsug gi nor bu blangs nas kyi hud khyod kyis bdag la 'di tsam kho na bstan par byas /
T09TD4154E:247a-8: snying la brlan nas aa ha ha gus pas shin tu rings nas 'dug cing mgo btud pas //
T09TD4154E:247a-9: rtag tu bdag gi rkang la phyag 'tshal khyod kyi ni //
T09TD4154E:247a-10: gtsug gi nor bu 'di rtsub min yang brdar ba yis //
T09TD4154E:247a-11: bdag gi snying ni shin tu 'joms par byed pa ci //
T09TD4154E:247a-12: yum gyis kyi hud bu sprin gyi bzhon pa gang khyod ni bla ma'i zhabs kyi sri zhu bor nas gzhan pa'i bde ba nyid la sreng pa ma yin na /
T09TD4154E:247a-13: de ji ltar da ni yab spangs nas mtho ris kyi bde ba nyams su myong bar byed du song bar gyur /
T09TD4154E:247a-14: sprin gyi tog gis mchi ma dang bcas par lha mo yu cag sprin gyi bzhon pa med par 'tsho'am ci gang gis na de lta bu'i smre sngags rjod par byed /
T09TD4154E:247a-15: ma la ya can mas rkang pa dag la gtugs te /
T09TD4154E:247a-16: thal mo sbyar nas yab rje'i sras kyi mtshan ma gtsug gi nor bu dag stsol cig / gang gis na 'di snying la byas pas me bcug ste bdag nyid kyi gdung ba bsal bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:247a-17: sprin gyi tog gis bdag po'i brtul zhugs ma ci la 'khrugs par byed /
T09TD4154E:247a-18: bdag cag thams cad 'di nyid du nges pa ma yin nam /
T09TD4154E:247a-19: yum gyis kye rgyal po chen po de lta na ci zhig la thogs /
T09TD4154E:247a-20: sprin gyi tog gis ci la yang ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:247a-21: 'on kyang bsgrubs pa'i me las gzhan pa'i mes 'dus bya ba mngon par bsgrubs pa ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:247a-22: des na mchod sbyin gyi khang pa las me blangs te bdag cag rnams bsreg par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:247a-23: dung gi gtsug gis bdag nyid rtogs par ji ltar sdig can bdag gcig pu'i don du rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs 'di mtha' dag chad par 'gyur te /
T09TD4154E:247a-24: des na re zhig 'di skad do //
T09TD4154E:247a-25: gsal bar yab nges pa nyid du ma gyur par 'di 'dra ba'i thub chod sgrub par regs pa ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:247a-26: byed po'i rnam 'phrul ni rnam par bkra ba yin te /
T09TD4154E:247a-27: gal te na klu'i dgras 'di klu ma yin pa zhig go zhes shes te /
T09TD4154E:247a-28: sprin gyi bzhon pa 'tsho ba dang bcas pa nyid gtong ba yang srid do //
T09TD4154E:247a-29: des na khrag gi rgyun 'di nyid kyis re zhig pi na ta'i bu'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:247b-0: yum gyis rnam pa kun du lha rnams kyi @247b bka' drin gyis bu 'tsho ba dang ldan pa nyid mthong bar gyur cig / ma la ya can mas bdag nyid kyis rtogs par nges par 'di ni skal ba zhan pa bdag la dkon no //
T09TD4154E:247b-2: bu khyod kyi tshig mi bden pa ma yin par gyur cig / de lta na yang me dang bcas pa nyid du bdag nyid 'gro bar rigs so //
T09TD4154E:247b-3: des na khyod rjes su song shig / bdag cag kyang me'i khang pa nas me blangs ta myur ba nyid du 'ong ngo //
T09TD4154E:247b-4: sprin gyi tog btsun mo dang mna' ma dang bcas pa song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:247b-5: dung gi gtsug gis des na re zhig mkha' lding gi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:247b-6: 'jig rten 'das gyur spyod pa dag gis gtsang ba'i lus dang ldan //
T09TD4154E:247b-7: bya yi bdag po blo gros 'khrul pa dag gis khyer ba 'di //
T09TD4154E:247b-8: ji srid zos par ma gyur de srid rab tu bsrung ba'i phyir //
T09TD4154E:247b-9: sa gzhi 'dzin pa mchog tu mtho ba'i phyir ni 'gro bar bya //
T09TD4154E:247b-10: zhes te dung gi gtsug song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:247b-13: // / des na dung gi gtsug zhugs par gyur te /
T09TD4154E:247b-14: mdun du nges par brtags nas /
T09TD4154E:247b-15: khrag gis brlan pa'i mchu dag brdar bas ril dro ni gsar pa bzhin byed cing //
T09TD4154E:247b-16: rang gi 'dren byed 'od zer me yi phreng bas nye ba'i nags kyi khongs dag bsregs //
T09TD4154E:247b-17: 'jigs rung rdo rje ltar rtsub sder mo dag ni mtha' rus la brdab cing bying //
T09TD4154E:247b-18: sbrul gyi dgra 'di mal ya yi cog gi rtse mor ring po dag nas mthong //
T09TD4154E:247b-19: de nas mdun du sprin gyi bzhon pa 'gyel ba'i mkha' lding zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:247b-20: mkha' lding gi bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa skyes nas bzung ste lag 'gro'i bdag po dag zos par gyur na /
T09TD4154E:247b-21: 'di 'dra ba'i ya mtshan dang bcas pa ni bdag gis sngar ma mthong ngo //
T09TD4154E:247b-22: gang zhig sems dpa' chen po 'di la gdung ba med pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
T09TD4154E:247b-23: dga' brgya chen po dang bcas pa bzhin du yang mthong ngo //
T09TD4154E:247b-25: brtan pa'i rgya mtsho 'di yi khrag ni lhag par 'thungs kyang dman par 'gyur pa med //
T09TD4154E:247b-26: sha dag rab tu bcad pa las skyes gdung ba 'dzin yang dga' bas bzhin rab dangs //
T09TD4154E:247b-27: gang zhig lus ni zos pa min pa de la spu long 'di ni gsal pos mtshan //
T09TD4154E:247b-28: gnod byed bdag la yang ni 'di yi mig dag phan pa byed pa bzhin du blta //
T09TD4154E:247b-29: des na 'di yi brtan pa'i tshul gyis bdag ni dge mtshan dang ldan pa bzhin du byas so //
T09TD4154E:247b-31: re zhig su yin brtag par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:247b-32: sprin gyi bzhon pas mkha' lding la bltas nas /
T09TD4154E:247b-33: bdag gi lus la da dung sha dag yod //
T09TD4154E:247b-34: rtsa sgo rnams las khrag ni zag pa nyid//
T09TD4154E:248a-0: @248a * // khyod kyang tshim par gyur pa ma mthong na //
T09TD4154E:248a-1: mkha' lding zas kyi don la chags bral ci //
T09TD4154E:248a-2: mkha' lding gi bdag nyid kyis rtogs shing ngo mtshar dang bcas par ji ltar na 'di gnas skabs 'di la yang 'di ltar snying stobs dang ldan pa nyid du mngon par brjod /
T09TD4154E:248a-4: khyod kyi snying las khrag dag ni //
T09TD4154E:248a-5: bdag gi mchu yis rab tu 'phrog / slar yang khyod kyi brtan pa 'dis //
T09TD4154E:248a-6: bdag gi snying nyid phrogs par gyur //
T09TD4154E:248a-7: de'i phyir khyod su yin thos par 'dod do //
T09TD4154E:248a-9: 'di ltar bkres pa'i sdug bsngal gyis //
T09TD4154E:248a-10: gzir la khyod kyis mnyan mi 'os //
T09TD4154E:248a-11: re zhig bdag gi sha dang ni //
T09TD4154E:248a-12: khrag rnams dag gis tshim par mdzod //
T09TD4154E:248a-13: dung gi gtsug gis rings pa dang bcas par nye bar btud de /
T09TD4154E:248a-14: mkha' lding mkha' lding nges par thub chod dag bsgrub par mi bya'o //
T09TD4154E:248a-15: 'di ni klu ma yin pas yongs su thong la bdag zo shig / bdag ni klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis khyod kyi zas kyi don du btang ba'o brang bstan to //
T09TD4154E:248a-16: sprin gyi bzhon pas dung gi gtsug la lta zhing kye ma dung gi gtsug 'ongs te /
T09TD4154E:248a-17: bdag gi yid la re ba 'bras bu med par byas so //
T09TD4154E:248a-18: mkha' lding gis gnyi ga la bltas nas /
T09TD4154E:248a-19: gnyi g-yang gsod pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pas gang nges par klu yin zhes bdag gis ma rtogs so //
T09TD4154E:248a-20: dung gi gtsug gis khyod ni gnas ma yin pa la 'khrul pa ste /
T09TD4154E:248a-21: brang la bkra shis mtshan ma lta zhog bdag gi lus la shun pa ma mthong ngam //
T09TD4154E:248a-22: rjod par byed bzhin du yang lce gnyis dag ni khyod kyis nges par ma 'grangs sam //
T09TD4154E:248a-23: mi bzad dug gi me yi du ba'i tshogs kyis rin chen 'od zer nyams byed cing //
T09TD4154E:248a-24: bzod dka' gdung bas sdud byas rlung gis rgyas gyur gdengs ka 'di gsum ma mthong ngam //
T09TD4154E:248a-25: mkha' lding gis dung gi gtsug gi gdengs ka mthong nas /
T09TD4154E:248a-26: sprin gyi bzhon pa la lta zhing nges par 'di su zhig bdag gis bsad par gyur /
T09TD4154E:248a-28: kye 'di ni rig pa 'dzin pa sprin gyi bzhon pa'o //
T09TD4154E:248a-30: 'di rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi thig le sprin gyi bzhon pa yin nam /
T09TD4154E:248a-31: ri rab mand'a ra'i ngos dang gangs kyi rtse dang dbang chen dag gi ri ;
T09TD4154E:248a-32: / ke la sha yi rdo ba'i gzhi dang ma la ya yi ngos kyi cha dag dang /
T09TD4154E:248a-33: phyogs ni de dang de dag rnams su gang gi grags pa rnam mang 'jig rten dang //
T09TD4154E:248a-34: 'jig rten min par rnam dpyod rgyu ba'i tshogs rnams dag gis glur len de dag thos //
T09TD4154E:248a-35: rnam pa thams cad du grags pa ma yin pa'i 'dam chen por bying bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:248b-0: sprin gyi bzhon pas @248b gdengs can gyi bdag po ci'i phyir 'di ltar yid 'byung bar byed /
T09TD4154E:248b-2: 'di yid 'byung ba'i gnas ma yin nam ci /
T09TD4154E:248b-3: rang gi lus kyis bdag gi lus 'di mkha' lding las yongs su bsrungs pa khyod kyis bdag sa 'og las kyang 'og tu dgyer bar 'os so //
T09TD4154E:248b-4: mkha' lding gis aa ye ji ltar brtse bas brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid chen po 'di bdag gis bza' ba'i spyod yul du gyur pa'i gdengs can rnams kyi srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir bdag nyid rang zas kyi don du nya bar 'ongs so //
T09TD4154E:248b-5: des na bdag gi bya ba ma yin pa chen po byas so //
T09TD4154E:248b-7: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di nyid gsad par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:248b-8: des na sdig pa chen po 'di dag par byed pa ni mer rab tu 'jug pa las gzhan ma mthong ngo //
T09TD4154E:248b-9: des na nges par bdag gis me dag gang du rnyed par 'gyur /
T09TD4154E:248b-10: phyogs rnams su blta zhing aa ye su zhig 'dis me blangs nas 'di nyid du 'ong bar byed de /
T09TD4154E:248b-11: re zhig 'dir rjes su bskyang bar bya'o /
T09TD4154E:248b-12: de nas dung gi gtsug gis gzhon nu khyod kyi yab yum 'di dag byon to //
T09TD4154E:248b-14: rings pa dang bcas par dung gi gtsug nye bar 'dug ste stod g-yogs 'dis lus yongs su bsgribs pa byas nas nye bar gnas pas bdag gzung bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:248b-15: gzhan du gal te na 'phral la 'di 'dra ba mthong na yum gyi srog gtong bar 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:248b-16: dung gi gtsug gis logs su 'dug ste stod g-yogs bzung nas de ltar byed do //
T09TD4154E:248b-17: de nas sprin gyi tog btsun mo dang mna' mar bcas pa zhugs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:248b-18: sprin gyi tog gis mchi ma dang bcas par /
T09TD4154E:248b-20: bdag dang gzhan gyi 'di zhes bden par snying rje'i rim pa bdag la ga la yod //
T09TD4154E:248b-21: ci zhig mang po 'am gcig nyid bsrung zhes khyod la bsam pa ji ltar skyes ma gyur //
T09TD4154E:248b-22: mkha' lding dag las sbrul 'di bsrung phyir rang srog gces pa yongs su gtong bar byed mod kyi //
T09TD4154E:248b-23: gang zhig gis ni bdag dang pha ma chung ma dag gi tshogs 'di lus pa med par bcom //
T09TD4154E:248b-24: ma la ya can mas kyi hud rje'i sras rjes su 'brang ba'i skye bo dor nas gcig pu gang du gshegs //
T09TD4154E:248b-25: skal ba zhan ma bdag rjes su skyongs shig / yum gyis ma la ya can ma la mtshon nas bu mo yud tsam ma du zhig / mchi ma rgyun du lhung bas me nyams par byed do //
T09TD4154E:248b-26: thams cad song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:248b-27: mkha' lding gis kyi hud bu sprin gyi bzhon pa zhes smra ba 'di gsal bar 'di'i yab yin no //
T09TD4154E:249a-2: bu bsad pas ngo tshabs na 'di'i bzhin la blta bar mi nus so //
T09TD4154E:249a-3: yang na me'i ched du yongs su 'khrugs pas ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:249a-4: bdag chu gter gyi dogs nyid du gnas par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:249a-5: de nas re zhig da ni 'jig rten gsum za rol bskyod pa'i dus kyi lce rtse dang 'dra 'bar zhing 'khyog / kun nas rab tu g-yo zhing rgya mtsho dag ni rtsva bzhin kham du byed par 'dod //
T09TD4154E:249a-6: rang gi gshog rlung ltas ngan rlung rab dkrigs 'dra rab tu gsal bas bskyod byas pas //
T09TD4154E:249a-7: 'jigs rung bskal pa tha ma'i me 'dra rtag dong me 'di la ni bdag mchod do //
T09TD4154E:249a-10: kye 'dab chags kyi rgyal po sdig pa 'di dag par byed pa ni rtsom pa 'di ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:249a-11: mkha' lding gis pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas bdag nyid chen po'o na ci yin smros shig / sprin gyi bzhon pas /
T09TD4154E:249a-12: skad cig sdod cig / bdag gi pha ma dag 'ongs pa 'di dag la re zhig phyag bya'o //
T09TD4154E:249a-13: mkha' lding gis de bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:249a-15: dga' ba dang bcas par lha mo dga' ba 'phel bar mdzod cig / bu sprin gyi bzhon pa 'di ni 'tsho'o //
T09TD4154E:249a-16: 'tsho ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
T09TD4154E:249a-17: slob mas bya ba bzhin du mkha' lding gis thal mo sbyar zhing nye bar bsten te gnas so //
T09TD4154E:249a-18: yum gyis rgyal po chen po nyams pa med pa nyid du bu'i bzhin mthong ba ni bdag cag don byas pa yin no //
T09TD4154E:249a-20: gang bden par rje'i sras mthong bzhin du yang shin tu mdza'i bas bdag gi snying yid mi ches so //
T09TD4154E:249a-21: sprin gyi tog gis nye bar btud nas /
T09TD4154E:249a-22: bu tshur shog tshur shog / bdag la yongs su 'khyud cig / sprin gyi bzhon pas ldang bar 'dod pa na stong g-yogs lhung zhing brgyal bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:249a-23: dung gi gtsug gis gzhon nu thugs rton cig / sprin gyi tog gis nye bar btud nas /
T09TD4154E:249a-24: bu ji ltar mthong yang bdag yongs su dor nas 'gro 'am /
T09TD4154E:249a-25: yum gyis kyi hud bu tshig tsam gyis kyang khyod phebs par mi smra 'am /
T09TD4154E:249a-26: ma la ya can mas rje'i sras ji ltar na nyid bla ma'i skye bo la yang ltos par mi bgyid lags brgyal bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:249a-27: dung gi gtsug gis bdag nyid la mtshon te /
T09TD4154E:249a-28: nyams pa dung gi gtsug khyod mngal nyid du cil mi 'chi /
T09TD4154E:249a-29: gang gis na 'di ltar skad cig skad cig la 'chi ba bas lhag pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed //
T09TD4154E:249a-31: 'di thams cad ni gtum po ma brtags par byed pa bdag gis bskyed pa'o //
T09TD4154E:249a-32: des na re zhig 'di ltar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:249b-0: gshog pas rlung g-yob cing @249b yid brtan par mdzod cig / bdag nyid chen po yid brtan par mdzod cig / sprin gyi bzhon pas yid brtan nas dung gi gtsug bla ma dag dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig / dung gi gtsug gis de ltar byed do //
T09TD4154E:249b-1: yab yum dbugs phyin par mdzod cig sprin gyi bzhon pa ni dbugs phyin par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:249b-2: ci mi lta 'am slar la khyed nyid du dbugs dbyung ba'i slad du nye bar 'khod de gnas so //
T09TD4154E:249b-3: gnyi ga dbugs phyin par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:249b-4: yum gyis kyi hud bu bdag cag gis mthong bzhin nyid du mthar byed nyams pas khyod pham par byed do //
T09TD4154E:249b-5: sprin gyi tog gis 'tsho zhing tshe dang ldan bzhin du bkra mi shis pa 'di lta bu ma brjod cig / des re zhig mna' ma yang dbugs phyung shig / yum gyi gdong gos kyis bsgribs nas du bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:249b-6: 'di ltar bkra mi shis pa nyams par gyur cig du bar mi bya'o //
T09TD4154E:249b-7: bu mo dbugs phyin par gyis shig / dbugs phyin par gyis shig / longs shig 'di nyid kyi dus su khyod kyis bdag po'i gdong mthong ngo //
T09TD4154E:249b-8: ma la ya can ma dbugs phyin nas kyi hud rje'i sras dga' ba yang btang nas gcig pu nyid du gshegs par bzhed dam /
T09TD4154E:249b-9: yum gyis ma la ya can ma'i kha lag pas bsgribs nas bu mo de ltar ma brjod cig /'di dag nyams par gyur cig / sprin gyi tog gis mchi ma dang bcas shing bdag nyid kyis rtogs par /
T09TD4154E:249b-10: yan lag kun zos gnas med bzhin //
T09TD4154E:249b-11: srog 'gro mgrin pa'i phyogs la ni //
T09TD4154E:249b-12: brten pa'i bu ni mthong gyur nas //
T09TD4154E:249b-13: sdig bdag ji ltar brgyal mi 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:249b-15: bdag ni shin tu sdig pa byed ma ste /
T09TD4154E:249b-16: gang rje'i sras 'di ltar gyur pa mthong yang da dung yang srog yongs su mi gtong ngo //
T09TD4154E:249b-17: yum gyi 'dren pa'i lus la kun du reg cing /
T09TD4154E:249b-19: gtum po khyod kyis da ji ltar bdag gi bu na tshod yongs su ma rdzogs shing mdzes pa'i lus can 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su byas par gyur /
T09TD4154E:249b-20: sprin gyi bzhon pas yum de ltar ma brjod cig /'dis ci zhig byas /
T09TD4154E:249b-21: sngon du yang don dam par 'di lta bu nyid do//
T09TD4154E:249b-22: ltos shig / tshil dang rus pa dag dang rkang //
T09TD4154E:249b-23: sha khrag tshogs ni pags pas g-yogs //
T09TD4154E:249b-24: lus kyi ming can rtag tu ni //
T09TD4154E:249b-25: 'jigs rung ston la mdzes pa ci //
T09TD4154E:249b-26: mkha' lding gis kye bdag nyid chen po dmyal ba'i me 'bar ba nyams su myong bar byed pa bzhin du bdag nyid sems par byed cing sdug bsngal bar gnas so //
T09TD4154E:250a-0: @250a * // des na nye bar bstan par mdzod cig / gang gis sdig pa las grol bar 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:250a-1: sprin gyi bzhon pas yab bdag la gnang ba gsol cig /'di'i sdig pa yongs su 'dzad pa nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:250a-2: sprin gyi tog gis bu de bzhin gyis shig / sprin gyi bzhon pas bi na ta'i bu nyon cig / mkha' lding gis thal mo sbyar nas pus mo btsugs te bka' stsol cig / sprin gyi bzhon pas /
T09TD4154E:250a-3: rtag tu srog chags gsod la rnam par log cing sngar byas pa yang rjes su 'gyod par byos //
T09TD4154E:250a-4: sems can kun la mi 'jigs ster zhing bsod nams dag gi rgyu ni 'bad pas rab tu bsgrubs //
T09TD4154E:250a-5: gang gis srog chags 'tshe bdag las thob sdig de 'dir 'bras bu yongs su smin mi 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:250a-6: gting mtha' rtogs par dka' ba mtsho yi chu nang dag tu lan tsha'i cha ni 'phangs pa bzhin //
T09TD4154E:250a-8: rmongs pa'i gnyid du song ba bdag / khyod kyis rab tu sad par byas //
T09TD4154E:250a-9: srog chags gsod pa thams cad las //
T09TD4154E:250a-10: ding nas bzung ste bdag ldog go //
T09TD4154E:250a-11: sprin gyi bzhon pas legs so //
T09TD4154E:250a-12: sems dpa' chen pho legs so //
T09TD4154E:250a-13: bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo //
T09TD4154E:250a-14: rnam pa thams cad du brtan par gnas par mdzod cig / dung gi gtsug la mtshon nas dung gi gtsug da ni khyim du 'gro bar mdzod cig / dung gi gtsug shugs rings phyung nas kha 'og tu bltas te 'dug go //
T09TD4154E:250a-16: dung gi gtsug ci'i slad du shugs ring phyung ste /
T09TD4154E:250a-17: kha 'og tu bltas nas 'dug par byed /
T09TD4154E:250a-18: song lam la ltos shig / khyod ni mkha' lding mchu rtse yis //
T09TD4154E:250a-19: rab tu bcom par rnam rtog cing //
T09TD4154E:250a-20: khyod kyi ma de khyed sdug pas //
T09TD4154E:250a-21: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal ldan par gnas //
T09TD4154E:250a-22: yum gyis mchi ma dang bcas par gang zhig nges par mkha' lding gi khar lhung yang lus nyams pa med pa'i bu mthong ba de ni skal ba dang ldan pa zhig go //
T09TD4154E:250a-24: gal te gzhon nu rnal du gnas par gyur na 'di dag bden pa nyid do //
T09TD4154E:250a-25: sprin gyi bzhon pas tshor bar ldan pa'i gar byed do //
T09TD4154E:250a-26: aa ha ha gzhan don phun tshogs ro yis g-yengs gyur te //
T09TD4154E:250a-27: 'di snyed dus su bdag gis rig ma gyur //
T09TD4154E:250a-28: da ni gnad gcod pa yi tshor bdag / bdag ni gzir ba'i slad du rtsom par byed //
T09TD4154E:250a-29: 'chi ba'i skabs kyi gar byed do //
T09TD4154E:250a-30: sprin gyi tog gis rtabs pa dang bcas par /
T09TD4154E:250a-31: bu de ltar ci zhig byed yum gyis /
T09TD4154E:250a-32: kyi hud 'di dag ci zhig byung /
T09TD4154E:250b-0: brang rdung ba dang bcas par yongs su @250b skyobs shig / yongs su skyobs shig / bdag gi bu 'di ni 'chi bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:250b-2: kyi hud rje'i sras po khyod ni yongs su 'dor bar 'dod pa bzhin du mtshon no 'di ci zhig byung /
T09TD4154E:250b-3: sprin gyi bzhon pas thal mo sbyar bar 'dod cing /
T09TD4154E:250b-4: dung gi gtsug bdag gi lag pa sbyor cig / dung gi gtsug gis de ltar byed cing mchi ma dang bcas par kye ma cung zad nas 'gro ba mun par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:250b-5: sprin gyi bzhon pas phyed rab tu bye ba'i mig gis pha ma blta zhing yab yum 'di ni bdag gi phyi ma yong pa ma yin pa'i phyag go //
T09TD4154E:250b-6: sems dang bral ba'i lus 'di dag ni las su mi rung zhing /
T09TD4154E:250b-7: rna bas tshig dang yi ge gsal po'i sgra dag thos ma yin //
T09TD4154E:250b-8: mig 'di 'phral la su zhig dag gis zum par byas pa bzhin //
T09TD4154E:250b-9: yab lags dbang bral bdag gi srog kyang kye ma 'gro bar byed //
T09TD4154E:250b-11: yum gyis kyi hud bu kyi hud snying rjes mnyes gshin sprin gyi bzhon pa khyod slar gang du blta bar bya /
T09TD4154E:250b-13: kyi hud sprin gyi bzhon pa /
T09TD4154E:250b-14: kyi hud don gnyer gyi skye bo la byams pa /
T09TD4154E:250b-15: kyi hud yon tan kun gyi gter /
T09TD4154E:250b-17: bdag gi tshig lan byin cig / lag pa bsgrengs te sdug bsngal lo //
T09TD4154E:250b-19: brtan pa bdag la gzhi med dul pa lam ni gang du 'gro bar 'gyur //
T09TD4154E:250b-20: bzod pa 'dzin bzod su zhig 'di na sbyin pa lhur len dag dang bral /
T09TD4154E:250b-21: bde nas bde bar bcom ste snying rje sdug pa de ring gang du 'gro //
T09TD4154E:250b-22: bu khyod 'jig rten gzhan du song tshe 'gro ba stong pa nyid 'gyur ro //
T09TD4154E:250b-24: kyi hud rje'i sras bdag yongs su btang nas khyod gang du gshegs /
T09TD4154E:250b-25: ma la ya can brtse med ma ci zhig 'di blta bar bya ba'i phyir 'di snyed kyi dus su 'tsho 'am /
T09TD4154E:250b-26: dung gi gtsug gis gzhon nu srog las kyang lhag par phangs pa'i 'khor bdag btang nas gang du gshegs /
T09TD4154E:250b-27: des na nges par dung gi gtsug rjes su bkri bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:250b-28: mkha' lding gis sdug bsngal lo //
T09TD4154E:250b-29: bdag nyid chen po 'di grongs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:250b-30: da ni bdag gis ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:250b-31: yum gyis mchi ma dang bcas par steng du bltas nas bcom ldan 'jig rten skyong ba rnams ji lta ji ltar yang bdud rtsis bran nas bdag gi bu 'tsho bar mi mdzad dam /
T09TD4154E:250b-32: mkha' lding gis dga' ba dang bcas shing bdag nyid kyis rtogs par bdud rtsi smos pas legs par dran te /
T09TD4154E:250b-33: bdag grags pa nyams pa dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo //
T09TD4154E:251a-0: des na lha'i bdag po la mngon par blangs te des byin pa'i bdud @251a * //
T09TD4154E:251a-1: rtsi'i char gyis sprin gyi bzhon pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de sngar so'i dug can zos pa'i rus pa'i phung po 'di dag kyang slar 'tsho bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:251a-2: ci ste 'di ma byin na de'i tshe /
T09TD4154E:251a-3: bdag gis chu yi mgon po gshog pas 'thung zhing lus ni rab tu bskyod tshe drag po'i rlung dang ldan //
T09TD4154E:251a-4: me dang bcas pa'i nyi ma bcu gnyis mig gi 'od kyis sreg cing brgyal 'khrugs 'gyel 'gyur ba'i //
T09TD4154E:251a-5: mchu yis brgya byin rdo rje nor lha'i be con yi dags dbang po'i dbyig pa bcom byas nas //
T09TD4154E:251a-6: rang dgar gshog pa spangs te skad cig bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin char ni mngon par dbab par bya //
T09TD4154E:251a-7: nges na bdag 'ongs so zhes te song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:251a-9: dung gi gtsug da dung bsdad nas ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:251a-10: shing dag spungs la sreg khang sgrubs shig / gang gis na bdag cag 'di nyid dang lhan cig 'gro bar bya'o //
T09TD4154E:251a-11: yum gyis bu dung gi gtsug myur du myur du sgrubs shig / bdag cag med na khyod kyi grogs po'i brgyal bar gnas so //
T09TD4154E:251a-12: dung gi gtsug gis mchi ma dang bcas par bla ma dag gis ji ltar bka' stsal ba bzhin no //
T09TD4154E:251a-13: 'dir khyed cag las kho bo sngon du 'gro ba ma yin nam /
T09TD4154E:251a-14: langs nas sreg khang brtsigs te gar byas nas yab sreg khang 'di ni bsgrubs zin to //
T09TD4154E:251a-15: sprin gyi tog gis lha mo du ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
T09TD4154E:251a-16: des na longs shig sreg khang la 'dzeg par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:251a-17: thams cad langs par gyur to //
T09TD4154E:251a-18: ma la ya can mas thal mo sbyar te steng du bltas nas bcom ldan ma goo r'i khyod kyis bdag la rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba khyod kyi bdag por 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal na de yang ji ltar bdag skal ba zhan pa'i slad du khyod kyang bden pa gsung ba ma yin pa nyid du gyur to //
T09TD4154E:251a-19: de nas goo r'i rtabs pa dang bcas par zhugs te /
T09TD4154E:251a-20: rgyal po chen po sprin gyi tog thub chod dag nges par mi bya'o //
T09TD4154E:251a-22: ji ltar na mthong ba don yod ma //
T09TD4154E:251a-23: bcom ldan ma goo r'is ma la ya can ma la mtshon te /
T09TD4154E:251a-24: bu mo ji ltar na bdag bden pa ma yin pa smra ba yin ltos shig / sprin gyi bzhon pa la mngon par btud de /
T09TD4154E:251a-26: rang gi 'tsho ba dag gis kyang //
T09TD4154E:251a-27: 'gro ba rnams la phan byed pa //
T09TD4154E:251a-28: khyod la yongs su tshim mo bu //
T09TD4154E:251a-29: sprin gyi bzhon pa 'tsho gyur cig / sprin gyi bzhon pa langs so //
T09TD4154E:251b-0: sprin gyi tog gis dga' ba dang bcas par lha mo dga' ba 'phel bar mdzod cig / slar yang @251b sprin gyi bzhon pa ni nyams pa med pa'i lus dang ldan no //
T09TD4154E:251b-1: yum gyis langs te dga' ba dang bcas par bcom ldan ma'i bka' drin gyis so //
T09TD4154E:251b-2: rkang pa dag la gtugs so //
T09TD4154E:251b-3: gnyi gas sprin gyi bzhon pa la 'khyud do //
T09TD4154E:251b-4: ma la ya can mas rje'i sras slar 'tsho bar byas pa ni dga'o //
T09TD4154E:251b-5: goo r'a'i zhabs dag la gtugs so //
T09TD4154E:251b-6: sprin gyi bzhon pas goo r'i mthong ste thal mo sbyar te /
T09TD4154E:251b-7: ji ltar bcom ldan goo r'i /
T09TD4154E:251b-8: mngon par 'dod las lhag pa'i mchog ster ma //
T09TD4154E:251b-9: skye bo phongs pa'i rgud 'phrog skyob byed ma //
T09TD4154E:251b-10: goo r'i rig 'dzin rigs kyi lha nyid ma //
T09TD4154E:251b-11: khyod kyi zhabs gnyis dag la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T09TD4154E:251b-15: ji ltar sprin med pa'i char 'bab //
T09TD4154E:251b-16: bcom ldan ma 'di ci zhig goo r'is //
T09TD4154E:251b-17: rgyal po chen po sprin gyi bzhon pa dang //
T09TD4154E:251b-18: lto 'phye'i bdag po rus pa'i lhag mar gyur pa 'di dag slar 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir 'dab chags kyi bdag po 'gyod pa yang dag par skyes pas lha'i 'jig rten nas bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs par byed do //
T09TD4154E:251b-19: mdzub mos ston cing khyod kyis ma mthong dam ci //
T09TD4154E:251b-20: gdengs ka'i nor bu gsal zhing rab 'bar yan lag mchog ldan nyams pa med pa'i lus thob cing //
T09TD4154E:251b-21: bdud rtsi'i ro ni myang ba la chags lce rtse gnyis kyis sa la rab tu ldag byed cing //
T09TD4154E:251b-22: dug 'dzin bdag po 'di dag da ni mgyogs pa dang bcas 'khyog por 'jug pa'i lam dag nas //
T09TD4154E:251b-23: ri bo ma la ya yi klung gi chu rgyun bzhin du chu yi phung pos 'jug par byed //
T09TD4154E:251b-24: sprin gyi bzhon pa la mtshon nas bu sprin gyi bzhon pa khyod la 'tsho ba tsam nyid 'os pa ma yin no //
T09TD4154E:251b-25: des na gzhan 'di yang khyod la bsgrub par bya'o //
T09TD4154E:251b-26: dang pa'i phrag pas gser gyi pad bcom rdul gyis reg pa'i 'dam ni spangs gyur cing //
T09TD4154E:251b-27: bdag gi yid mtsho las byung rgyun chad med pa'i chu ni dag pa chen po yis //
T09TD4154E:251b-28: rang 'dod kyis sprul rin chen bum pa bkod de bdag rang nyid kyis dbang bskur nas //
T09TD4154E:251b-29: dga' bas khyod ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar skad cig nyid la bya //
T09TD4154E:251b-30: gzhan yang gser gyi 'khor lo 'di ni mdun du byung bar gyur pa dang //
T09TD4154E:251b-31: so bzhi dag gis mtshan pa'i gnyis 'thung dkar po 'di dang ni //
T09TD4154E:251b-32: sdo [*sngo] bsangs rta mchog ma la ya can yang ste 'di dag ni //
T09TD4154E:251b-33: khyod kyi rin chen rnams so 'khor los sgyur ba legs par ltos //
T09TD4154E:252a-0: gzigs par mdzod cig / ma tang ga de ba la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i bdag @252a * //
T09TD4154E:252a-1: po 'di rnams bdag gis bskul te /
T09TD4154E:252a-2: gtsug gi nor bu rab tu mdzes pa'i 'od zer gyis dbang po'i gzhu'i phreng ba 'god cing gus pas slob ma'i lus mngon par btud de phyag 'tshal bar byed do //
T09TD4154E:252a-3: bu slar yang khyod la dga' ba ci zhig bya //
T09TD4154E:252a-5: 'di las gzhan pa'i dga' ba ci zhig yod /
T09TD4154E:252a-6: dung gi gtsug 'di 'dab chags bdag po'i kha las bskyabs shing bi na ta las skyes pa btul /
T09TD4154E:252a-7: de yis sngar zos dug 'dzin bdag po gang yin de dag rnams kyang thams cad sos par byas //
T09TD4154E:252a-8: bdag srog rnyed pas bla ma rnams kyi 'tsho ba ma btang 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dag thob //
T09TD4154E:252a-9: khyod kyang mngon sum du mthong 'di las dga' ba gzhan gang bdag ni ci zhig don du gnyer //
T09TD4154E:252a-10: de lta mod kyis 'di ltar gyur cig rma bya rab dga'i 'jo sgeg ltar byed chu 'dzin dag ni dus su char 'bebs shing //
T09TD4154E:252a-11: sa gzhi rgyun du rab 'khrungs lo thog ljang gu'i gos dang ldan par byed gyur cig / ngogs bzhin lus kyi tshogs gtam 'ga' zhig dag tu gling gi rnam pa dang //
T09TD4154E:252a-12: 'ga' zhig dag tu lus po bskyil ba'i 'khor lo dag tu 'khrul bar byed //
T09TD4154E:252a-13: 'ga' zhig tu yang rgya mtsho'i chur bying zam pa dag dang mtshungs pa ste //
T09TD4154E:252a-14: klu yi tshogs rnams rgya mtsho chen por bde ba nyid du rol gyur cig / gzhan yang khyod kyi grags pa 'di dag tsan dan gi nags tshal 'dir ni klu yi na chung rnams //
T09TD4154E:252a-15: li khris byugs bzhin rab rno nyi ma'i 'od zer reg pas 'gram pa dmar ba dang ldan zhing //
T09TD4154E:252a-16: skra yi tshogs pa rab 'dzin dgod pa'i ngal du bdag gis lus dman gdung ba mi rtsi bar //
T09TD4154E:252a-17: ting ting shag lhung blangs nas khu bu ga bzhin du shin tu rab snyan chags las sgrogs gyur cig rgud pa dang bral phrag dog med pa'i yid kyis legs byas rab tu rgyas byed cing //
T09TD4154E:252a-18: stug po'i gnyen 'dun grogs kyi tshogs kyis rab dga' skye dgu rnams ni dga' gyur cig / thams cad song bar gyur to //
T09TD4154E:252a-20: klu kun du dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zlos gar dpal dga' ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T09TD4154E:252a-22: // / yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po dang /
T09TD4154E:252a-23: dpon chen sh'akya bzang po'i bka' lung gis /
T09TD4154E:252a-24: rgya gar gyi mkhan po lakshm'i ka ra dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong shong ston gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o /
